episodes.title: ALN - Gina Grad
episodes.summary: Gina Grad is bringing funny and news to the world everyday on the ADAM CAROLLA PODCAST, but today she brings the funny to ALN! From her early days in Kansas City theater, to her struggles in NYC, her love for radio, and her journey into the LA market, will inspire the hell out of you. She's sweet, she's hilarious, and she's a fun hang, so enjoy this special episode and follow Gina on TWITTER @GinaGrad, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jeremy D. Howard
episodes.summary: Jeremy D. Howard makes his ALN debut to talk growing up one of 7 siblings, being a plus size model, how he loves the N-word, and the experience of getting cast in the NEW MADtv! He's one of the kindest most hilarious people you'll ever meet, and he brought it on this episode. Follow Jeremy on TWITTER @fatmodelj, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam fly solo this week, and shit gets real. From alien invasions, to Brad's crazy ZOO experience, to Adam's stories from the ADAM DEVINE tour, their is no shortage of laughs. Go see Brad in DC this weekend, and Adam in Oregon, San Fran & LA on the last leg of the WEIRD LIFE TOUR. Enjoy this episode & follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Ryan Sickler
episodes.summary: Ryan Sickler of THE CRABFEAST returns to talk producing The COMEDY JAM for Comedy Central, how he was almost eaten by a snake, the most insane fight story of all time, and fatherhood. It's a laugh filled ep from top to bottom!! Check out his podcast THE CRABFEAST with Jay Larson and follow Ryan on TWITTER @ryansickler, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Michael Kosta
episodes.summary: Michael Kosta makes his ALN debut to talk growing up in Michigan, starting comedy in LA, being a ranked tennis player in the US, how he found his voice in standup, and being on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno. So many laughs in this one, and a ton of beneficial insights in the biz as well. Go see him live if you can, he's one of the best in the game. Check out his podcast WORST BIRTHDAY & follow Michael on TWITTER @MichaelKosta, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - J Chris Newberg
episodes.summary: The hilarious J Chris Newberg drops by the ALN podcast and we couldn't be more excited! Not only is he an amazing writer (he's written for American Idol, Russell Peters, Dane Cook, and so much more!) but he's also a great musician and he serenades us with some original songs! Enjoy this episode and follow him on twitter @TheChrisArmy, follow Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and the podcast @alnpodcast!

episodes.title: ALN - Justine Marino
episodes.summary: The hilarious Justine Marino makes her ALN debut and talks about moving to Los Angeles, learning at the Groundlings and her journey through improv and stand up, bringing cup cakes to comedy shows, funfetti, and so much more! Enjoy this episode and then check out her website JustineMarino.com, follow her on twitter @JustineMachine and follow the podcast on twitter Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Carol Leifer
episodes.summary: Carol Leifer has written for SEINFELD, SNL, MADtv, The Larry Sanders Show, Steve Martin, The Oscars, Ellen, has performed on Letterman 25 times, Johnny Carson, Howard Stern, is best friends with Larry David, Jay Leno & Bill Maher, and has a new book out called "HOW TO SUCCEED IN BUSINESS WITHOUT REALLY CRYING," that is a phenomenal read, filled with her experiences in the business that will make your life better.  Get her book on Amazon or ITUNES, enjoy the stories in this conversation & follow her on TWITTER @carolleifer, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - George Cox
episodes.summary: George Cox is one of the most impressive people to be a guest on this podcast! Not only is he Adam's stepdad, but he attended West Point, works at Morgan Stanley, is a master of puns, and founded an amazing Foundation that gives scholarships to incredible high school kids across the country that are underprivileged. It's called the ALEXANDER HAMILTON SCHOLARS, and you can donate to this amazing organization at hamiltonscholars.org!  This episode has laughs, inspiring perspectives, and a love story that'll make your heart warm. Enjoy this episode and hit up George on Facebook at Facebook.com/georgecox, & follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Sam Comroe
episodes.summary: Sam J. Comroe makes his ALN debut & hilariously tells us about being one of 7 kids, doing standup in the lunchroom in High School, how Ricky Gervais got him on CONAN, and growing up with Tourettes Syndrome. He's one of the funniest comics working, and a terrific human being. Check out his first standup special on Youtube titled "NORMAL BEHAVIOR" & follow him on TWITTER @SamuelJComroe.

episodes.title: ALN - Hugh Fink
episodes.summary: Hugh Fink is a comedy legend! From writing for SNL, Steve Martin, The Muppets, and co-creating the SHOWBIZ SHOW w/ David Spade, his stories are unforgettable. You may recognize him from countless appearances on David Letterman or THIS IS 40, and if you have a chance to see him LIVE, make it happen. Enjoy this episode and follow Hugh on TWITTER @hugh_fink, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Live! at RIOT LA
episodes.summary: Adam Devine & Brent Morin join the boys for a special LIVE episode at the RIOT LA Comedy Festival in downtown LA! This was recorded Jan 22nd at 5pm, and is filled with everything you want! From songs about pooping on airplanes, to WORKAHOLICS chatter, to Brent singing a Trump musical, and Brad showing Adam how weird Seattle is getting, it's laughs & laughs all the way through. So enjoy this one, check the calendar and come see ALN LIVE in a city near you!  Follow the boys on TWITTER @adamdevine, @brentmorin, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad, @averypearson & @alnpodcast!

episodes.title: ALN - Lachlan Patterson
episodes.summary: The great Lachlan Patterson makes his ALN debut and shares a horrifying story of having to shit during a show, his experience on Last Comic Standing, growing up in Canada, and how he survived the game show IDIOT TEST with Adam & Brad. Go see Lachlan LIVE, he's a phenomenal comic, and follow him on TWITTER @lachjaw, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Kyle Newacheck
episodes.summary: Kyle Newacheck is the director of WORKAHOLICS, and one of the founding members of the sketch group MAIL ORDER COMEDY, that later became the show featuring Adam Devine, Blake Anderson & Anders Holm! From Concord, CA, to Orange County, to LA film school, his journey and insights into comedy are some of the best we've heard. Accompany that with stories of directing Ben Stiller and wrestling an alligator in New Orleans, this is a must listen episode! Check out the final season of WORKAHOLICS on Comedy Central, every WEDNESDAY at 10pm, and follow Kyle on TWITTER @kylenewacheck, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jessimae Peluso
episodes.summary: Jessimae Peluso returns to the podcast for more laughs, sex talk, weed, and stories from the road! You know her GIRL CODE & CHELSEA LATELY, and she always delivers on the podcast! Go see her LIVE, enjoy this episode, and follow her on TWITTER @jessimaepeluso, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Andrew Siciliano
episodes.summary: Andrew Siciliano stops by to talk NFL playoff predictions, how he got his start in broadcasting, growing up a sports fan in Virginia, his worst days in Little League, and how the RED ZONE channel job came about. It's one of the most interesting, fun, and sports related episodes we've had in a while, and couldn't be more pumped for you to listen! Go Seahawks, and follow Andrew on TWITTER @AndrewSiciliano, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Lyric Lewis
episodes.summary: Lyric Lewis makes her ALN debut & is absolutely hysterical! From growing up in New Orleans, moving to Minnesota and finding her acting groove, to making into the Main Company in the prestigious GROUNDLINGS sketch troupe, and becoming a cast member on the new MADtv, her story is amazing. The episode ends with a hilarious JURASSIC PARK trivia game, as Lyric is obsessed with the film.  Fall in love with her in this episode, and follow her on TWITTER @lyricsaidwhaa, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Best Of 2016 #2
episodes.summary: The About Last Night Podcast 2016 Best-of PART TWO is here! Thank you to everybody who supported the show in 2016! Follow the show on twitter @AdamRayComedy, @FunnyBrad, and @ALNPodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Best Of 2016 #1
episodes.summary: The About Last Night Podcast 2016 Best-of PART ONE is here! Thank you to everybody who supported the show in 2016! Follow the show on twitter @AdamRayComedy, @FunnyBrad, and @ALNPodcast. Happy Holidays!

episodes.title: ALN - Brooks Wheelan
episodes.summary: Brooks Wheelan makes his ALN debut to discuss his wild journey at SNL, his love for camping, growing up in IOWA, and how drugs & women have given him incredible perspective. Brooks is one of the funniest in the game, and a solid dude all around. Get his CD "This is cool, right?" on ITUNES, and follow him on TWITTER @brookswheelan. Follow Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Neil Patrick Harris
episodes.summary: Neil Patrick Harris stops by to talk magic, fatherhood, his new series on Netflix "A SERIES OF UNFORTUNATE EVENTS," and the possibility of a Doogie Howser musical! Follow Neil on TWITTER @ActuallyNPH, @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad & @alnpodcast

episodes.title: ALN - Mo Mandel
episodes.summary: Mo Mandel returns to talk Match.com, why he stopped drinking, what Trump America looks like, and his new standup special "NEGATIVE REINFORCEMENT," now streaming on SEESO! Mo is a high energy, hilarious comic, with sharp opinions and a kind heart. Go see him live if you can, and follow him on TWITTER @momandel, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Heather McDonald
episodes.summary: The hilarious Heather McDonald stops by the podcast to discuss her experience on White Chicks and Chelsea Lately, what it's like to have a crazy sister, give out great marriage and dating advice, and explains how even a bonafide babe can scam you. Check out her podcast 'Juicy Scoop' and follow her on TWITTER @HeatherMcDonald and follow Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin
episodes.summary: Brent Morin returns for his 9th appearance, and brings an amazing amount of hilarious topics to discuss! From his thoughts on President Trump, to what his doll catchphrase would be, writing his new hour special, and rapping for LL Cool J on LIP SYNC BATTLE, it's another classic wild episode with lots of laughs and tangents that you'll be glad to go on.  Go see Brent live in a city near you, and follow him on TWITTER @brentmorin, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Godfrey
episodes.summary: Godfrey is a comedy beast! You've seen him on countless TV shows, comedy clubs, and as the 7-Up spokesmen! His stories from the road, growing up in Chicago, watching Robin Williams work, approach to comedy, is a free class in itself. He's one of the most naturally funny & inspiring dudes in the game, and this episode delivers like he does on stage. Go see him live, and follow Godfrey on TWITTER @Godfreycomedian, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Brett Ratner
episodes.summary: Brett Ratner has directed some of the biggest movies of all time! From RUSH HOUR, to X-MEN LAST STAND, FAMILY MAN & TOWER HEIST, his journey into this business is unlike any story you've heard. He made his way into NYU film school at 16, put Chris Tucker & Jackie Chan together, and was best buds with Michael Jackson. Hear it all in this fun and inspiring episode! Follow Brett on TWITTER @brettratner, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Dana Carvey
episodes.summary: Dana Carvey returns for his 4th appearance on the ALN podcast, and again, delivers a hilarious conversation! From his new NETFLIX special STRAIGHT WHITE MALE 60, to his marriage advice for Brad, to his current take on Trump, and a slew of more amazing impressions, this episode became an instant classic! Check out his new NETFLIX standup special November 4th, and follow Dana on TWITTER @danacarvey, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Nick Rutherford
episodes.summary: Nick Rutherford is a comedy gem. From his child acting days, to his improv troupe at USC, where he met GOOD NEIGHBOR sketch group members Kyle Mooney & Beck Bennett, and his new show on ADULT SWIM "Dream Corp LLC," produced by John Krasicki & Stephen Merchant, this episode has it all. Enjoy it many times, and follow Nick on TWITTER @nickrutherford, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris Spencer
episodes.summary: Chris Spencer has written for The Emmys, The ESPYS, House Husbands of Hollywood, In Living Color, and is one of the best comics working today! From hanging with OBAMA, playing basketball with Jordan, advice from Bill Cosby, and how he learned to hone his performer side, it's a hilarious conversation with stories you won't hear anywhere else! Enjoy it, and follow Chris on TWITTER @therealchrisspencer, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnbrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Carlie Craig
episodes.summary: MADtv's Carlie Craig is a comedy power house! She showed off her acting chops and killer impressions on the new MADtv, as well as USA's First Impressions, but that's just the beginning. From her early days in Florida growing up a tennis kid, to her teenage pop group, to assisting youtube and music sensation Todrick Hall, and how her spirituality has helped guide her career. It's an episode filled with tons of laughs, Ariana Grande impressions, and some hearty motivating moments. So enjoy it, and follow Carlie on TWITTER @carliecraig, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnbrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Kyle Kinane
episodes.summary: Kyle Kinane is one of the funniest dudes on earth, and a helluva standup comic! From his early days working at a warehouse in Chicago, to winning a competition and moving to LA, to becoming the voice of Comedy Central, and his latest special LOOSE IN CHICAGO premiering Oct 15th on Comedy Central, you'll enjoy this extra long conversation as much as we did. Check out his special when it drops Oct 15th, and follow him on TWITTER @kylekinane.

episodes.title: ALN - Piotr Michael
episodes.summary: MADtv's Piotr Michael is a master impressionist, and with spot on impressions of Donald Trump, Bernie Sanders, Jeff Goldblum, Steve Buscemi, George Lucas, and Ian McKellan, he had the guys laughing the whole time!  From his experience on the new MADtv, to how animation drew him to doing voices, his first taste of Hollywood heartbreak and almost getting SNL, to him doing Ian McKellan reading Jaden Smith tweets, this is a must listen! Follow Piot on TWITTER @ThisisPiotr, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and the pod @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - David Steinberg
episodes.summary: David Steinberg is a name you may not immediately recognize, but the man has been on the Tonight Show with Johnny Carson 140 times, directed countless episodes of Seinfeld, Curb Your Enthusiasm, and Mad About You, has weekly hangouts with Mel Brooks, Bob Saget, Bob Newhart, Larry David, and Don Rickles, and has stories from the business you won't believe! He's easily one of the nicest guys in the business, and if you love comedy, you'll love this conversation! Follow David on TWITTER @david_steinberg, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad and the show @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Wayne Brady
episodes.summary: The incredibly versatile Wayne Brady makes his ALN debut!  He discusses his early improv days in Florida, why he kept his job at Universal Studios during WHOSE LINE IS IT ANYWAY, improvising with Robin Williams, performing on Broadway, making the transition to the game show world, and some amazing childhood stories that'll inspire the hell out of you. He's one the greatest dudes around, and one of the most talented people on planet earth. Enjoy this special conversation, recorded in his dressing room at LET'S MAKE A DEAL, and follow him on TWITTER @waynebrady, Adam @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jason Derulo
episodes.summary: Jason Derulo is one of the biggest R&B pop superstars on the planet! He's sold over 56 million singles, has toured the globe, and when he was struggling in NYC, singing on the streets, he survived on noodles and bananas!  From his musical theater days, to collaborating with Stevie Wonder, his story is compelling and inspiring.  Jason was kind enough to allow us into his LA home to record this in his music studio, so go get his killer new single KISS THE SKY, and follow him on TWITTER @jasonderulo, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad and @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris Ahearn
episodes.summary: Chris Ahearn stops by to talk creating and producing game shows!! From casting Chris Jericho in DOWNFALL, to bringing back Match Game, producing LETS MAKE A DEAL with Wayne Brady and being Adam's first boss at Universal Studios! Lotta laughs in this one. You can follow the podcast @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad, @alnpodcast!

episodes.title: ALN - Mo Collins
episodes.summary: Mo Collins stops by to talk her early improv days in Minnesota, how she created some of her iconic MADtv characters, being on Parks & Rec, and her return to the classic show and her experience acting with Adam. It's an insightful and hilarious conversation you'll enjoy as much as we did. Follow Mo on Twitter @TheMoCollins, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad, @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Mark Gagliardi
episodes.summary: Mark Gagliardi was the first ever DRUNK HISTORY storyteller! So he's kind of directly responsible for the show becoming a hit on Comedy Central. Aside from being an amazing actor, comedian, and the voice of Batman in animated show SUPERFRIENDS, he worked with Adam at Universal Studios Hollywood, and shares plenty of hilarious stories and memories. Mark also is a big history buff, and recently made the move from LA to NYC, and breaks down the pros and cons to both cities. A great hang, and a super funny fella, you're gonna enjoy this episode as much as we did.  Check out his podcast WE GOT THIS on the Earwolf Network, and follow him on TWITTER @MarkGags, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jim Jefferies
episodes.summary: Jim Jefferies is hands down one of the best comics in the world, and this conversation proves he's also one of the funniest off stage as well. From meeting Al Pacino, to his early roots in Australia, to bar fights in England, it's laughs from start to finish. Check out his latest NETFLIX special "Free-Dumb," and follow Jim on TWITTER @jimjefferies, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jeff Dye
episodes.summary: Jeff Dye returns to talk about his new NBC show BETTER LATE THAN NEVER, his early learning struggles in Seattle, becoming pals with Russell Wilson, how his approach to comedy has changed over the years, and breaks down the incredible experience that was his late night debut on the TONIGHT SHOW with Jimmy Fallon! It's an instant classic episode, one you'll probably listen to twice. Enjoy the show, and follow the boys on TWITTER @JeffDye, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Earl Skakel
episodes.summary: The great Earl Skakel makes his ALN debut and delivers on all cylinders. From growing up next to OJ, to his recent success with Comedy Central's ROAST BATTLE, to having ties to the Kennedy's, and the greatest viagra story you'll ever hear, it's an instant classic. Enjoy this episode and follow Earl on TWITTER @EarlSkakel, Adam @adamraycomedy,  Brad @funnybrad, and follow the podcast @alnpodcast!

episodes.title: ALN - Matthew Geddes
episodes.summary: Matthew Geddes has lived an insane life, and was gracious enough to make his ALN debut and share one of the craziest stories of survival of discovery you'll ever hear. From a life threatening brain tumor, to his multiple eye opening Ayahuasca trips, and starting a huge weed pen company, he's an inspiring fella to say the least. Lotta laughs in this one, but a lot of conversation you need to hear to believe. Enjoy it, and follow the boys on TWITTER @matthew_geddes, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN Classic - Adam Devine Tour Recap
episodes.summary: Adam Devine went on his first national standup comedy tour last spring, and brought Adam Ray to open, and Kyle Walsh to tour manage. From sold out shows, to out of control parties in college towns, to hanging with the Kings of Leon, to Beefaroni sheets, this 90 minute recap is filled with non-stop laughs, and hilarious stories from the craziest 30 day stretch of their entire lives!  Enjoy the hell out of this one, and follow the boys on TWITTER @AdamDevine, @adamraycomedy, @goonssquad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jonny Loquasto
episodes.summary: Jonny Loquasto stops by to talk about making his own beer, how his transitioned from the hospital to comedy, and compares fat kid stories with Adam. Jonny is one of the nicest dudes in comedy, and his sharp point of view and strong energy, he's sure to have his own show someday. Enjoy this conversation and follow Jonny on TWITTER @jquasto, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Vinny Oshana
episodes.summary: Vinny Oshana makes his ALN debut and brings the heat! From his military days, to his views on recess teachers, to how he started comedy & how he's been welcomed into th Wayans family, it's a complete episode from start to finish! Vinny is one of the best comics in the game, and is moments away from blowing up. Go see him live & follow him on TWITTER @VincentOshana. Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Brody Stevens
episodes.summary: Brody Stevens makes his ALN debut to talk his approach to crowd work, his baseball career, influencing Adam in Seattle with a public access show, and working for Chelsea Handler.  A comic's comic, and one of the quickest minds you'll ever see live, there's only one Brody. Enjoy this hilarious conversation, and follow him on TWITTER @brodyismefriend, @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam
episodes.summary: The boys break down Brad's recent journey to China, and everything he experienced. The lack of social media, the language barriers, the racist culture, the comedy sensibilities, the insane travel fiascos, and how sports references make you comfortable in a foreign land. This is a classic non stop laughs episode between Brad & Adam, so enjoy it, and follow them on TWITTER @adamraycomedy, @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Kevin Eastman
episodes.summary: Kevin Eastman co-created the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, and for that, we are in eternally grateful. In this special LIVE conversation from the San Diego Comic Art Gallery, we hear stories of how the Turtles came to be, working with Jim Henson, the unexpected success of the cartoon, why Turtle condoms were turned down, and the craziest stories he heard from fans of all ages! It's an instant classic, and a rare sit-down with one of the biggest comic book innovators, and creative human being in the world. On top of being a great dude, Kevin gives a candid inside look into a world loved by so many. Enjoy the episode, and follow Kevin on TWITTER @kevineastman86, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and the pod @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Paul Feig #2
episodes.summary: Paul Feig returns to talk GHOSTBUSTERS!! The boys went to SONY, where Paul was editing the movie, and in this exclusive conversation discusses the pressures he dealt with in rebooting a beloved franchise, the amazing effects he's been witness to, his love for Legos, and how Adam got the role of Slimer. It's incredible from top to bottom, so enjoy. And of course, go see GHOSTBUSTERS when it comes out in theaters everywhere JULY 15th! Follow Paul on TWITTER @paulfeig, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Christopher Titus
episodes.summary: Christopher Titus makes his ALN debut to talk about how he prepped for his 7th comedy special,  the highs and lows of marriage and being a parent, how he lost his FOX sitcom, and his journey with comedy, which reminds us how intelligent, innovative, and he's one of the best comedians in the game. Enjoy this episode, watch his specials, and follow him on TWITTER @titusnation, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jake Szymanski
episodes.summary: Jake Szymanski stops by for his first ever podcast! His new movie MIKE & DAVE NEED WEDDING DATES is out July 8th, and is incredible! From casting Adam Devine, to his early days at Funnyordie directing Paris Hilton & Jim Carrey, to his improv days in Milwaukee, and how Will Ferrel and Adam McKay have influenced his work, it's a comedy dream episode for anyone who loves to laugh. Enjoy this conversation, go see his new movie, and follow Jake on TWITTER @szyjake, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, and the podcast @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Davey Jones
episodes.summary: Davey Jones is in the new Ghostbusters! While that is amazing, and his aunt Allison Jones, the biggest comedy casting director in Hollywood, is also amazing, he shares a story that will utterly change the way you think. You may laugh and cry in this episode, and you'll no doubt have a stronger appreciation for life. Go see Ghostbusters in theaters July 15th, and enjoy the insane journey that is this special episode! Follow Adam on TWITTER @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad, Davey @djbostonjones & the pod @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Aldis Hodge and Mike Jackson
episodes.summary: Aldis Hodge has starred in Friday Night Lights, Leverage, Straight Outta Compton, and now is the lead on the WGN drama UNDERGROUND. His journey to LA is incredible. He shares some great stories about working with Tom Cruise and Lebron James, as well as his passion for designing watches. Mike Jackson, a producer of UNDERGROUND and producing partner with John Legend, also stops by to break down how they found the show, finding the right projects to produce, and how he met John Legend one magical night. Enjoy this episode and follow Aldis on TWITTER @AldisHodge, Mike @mikemjackson312, Adam @adamraycomedy, Brad @funnybrad & the podcast @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Jonathan Kite #4
episodes.summary: Jonathan Kite is about to shoot his first hour special at his High School in Chicago, and stops by to talk about workshopping material, developing new impressions, and prank calls Adam's favorite Thai restaurant in an epic fashion. Get tickets to see Jon's special & follow him on Twitter @jbkite. Follow Adam & Brad @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Scotty Landes
episodes.summary: Scotty Landes stops by to talk finding his place in comedy in NYC, producing ADAM DEVINE'S HOUSE PARTY, and where his hilarious Twitter handle came from. He's a  well known writer in the comedy game, and shares some solid insight to his world. Enjoy this episode and follow the guys on TWITTER @marylandmudflap @adamraycomedy @funnybrad

episodes.title: ALN - Kira Soltanovich
episodes.summary: Comedian Kira Solanovich drops by to talk about having kids, her son "acting crazy" in school, her experiences having Soviet Russian immigrant parents, working in comedy, her time on 'Girls Behaving Badly', and so much more! You can follow Kira on TWITTER @kiracomedy, follow Adam @adamraycomedy & Brad @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Cort McCown
episodes.summary:
Comedian and Actor Cort McCown makes his hilarious debut to talk about being an extra on Teen Wolf, going to Hugh Hefner's birthday party at the Playboy mansion, how he started comedy and his early days at The Comedy Store, his love of hockey and being a golf caddy. You won't want to miss this one!

You should follow Cort on Twitter @cortmccown and check out his podcast 'Insensitivity Training'. You can follow Adam @adamraycomedy and Brad @funnybrad!

episodes.title: ALN - Backstage with Brad, Adam and Barry Katz
episodes.summary: In this special episode, we break down how Brad's life is post SHOWTIME special, how he prepared his second hour, and we listen to some bonus footage that was recorded backstage at the Alex Theater with the boys and two-time ALN guest Barry Katz! Enjoy this bonus episode & follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy @funnybrad & @alnpodcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Max Winkler
episodes.summary: Max Winkler stops by to talk his USC days with Adam, growing up with the Fonz as a father, how he found his passion for directing, and an amazing story of attending the greatest Bar Mitzvah of all time. Max is a rising star in Hollywood, so get to know him now, and follow the guys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Kelsey Cook
episodes.summary:
Kelsey Cook makes her ALN debut with possible the craziest story you will ever hear. 
From Spokane, WA, to Hollywood, she's made a quick splash when she met Jim Norton, and he asked her to go on tour!  She's sweet, she's funny, and her parents are world champion foosball players. Lotta laughs in this one, and a new career for you to follow. Enjoy this episode and follow Kelsey on TWITTER @kelseycook, Adam @adamraycomedy & Brad @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Ben Gleib #3
episodes.summary: Ben Gleib returns to discuss another season of his GSN show "Idiot Test," as well as some hilarious and insightful political rants! Also, Adam's childhood buddy and music producer Steven Aguilar joins the boys for to share what it was like meeting 5th grade Adam Ray. This episode was recorded at the Hollywood Improv in Los Angeles, CA and is jam packed with laughs from top to bottom. Enjoy it, and follow the gang on TWITTER @bengleib, @sjaguilar, @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad. And be sure to check out Ben Gleib's standup special "NEUROTIC GANGSTER" premiering June 3rd on SHOWTIME!

episodes.title: ALN - Tyler Spindel
episodes.summary: Tyler Spindel is a standup comic turned Hollywood Director, and is taking the scene by storm! Directing sketches for Chelsea Lately, Nick Swardson's PRETEND TIME, scenes in GROWNUPS and THE LONGEST YARD, as well as Youtube Red's upcoming debut series, "SING IT," Tyler is quickly making name for himself.  This episode is full of great stories. From his time at Harvard with Mark Zuckerberg, growing up with Adam Sanlder as an Uncle, to directing Bob Barker, and how he almost saw Adam Ray get arrested in San Diego, there are tons of laughs in this one, so enjoy. Check out Tyler's show "SING IT" on Youtube Red, and follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Jesse Joyce
episodes.summary: Jesse Joyce is one of the sharpest & funniest comics in the biz! From writing for @Midnight, to how he met the late great Greg Giraldo and writing for the Comedy Central Roasts, to his fascination with taxidermy, to a story from the road that will make you cry with laughter, this episode has it all.  Go see Jesse live, follow him on TWITTER @JesseJoyce, and enjoy the hell out of this one.

episodes.title: ALN - Marc Maron
episodes.summary: Marc Maron is directly responsible for the ALN podcast existing. He pioneered a new medium and made it cool, popular, and fun for fans of comedy around the world. Marc doesn't do a lot of other podcasts, so we were beyond thrilled he came by and chatted with us for over 2 hours! From doing cocaine with Sam Kinison, to starting comedy in Boston, to how WTF came to be, to Obama, to season 4 of his show MARON on IFC, and why he was cut out of D2 MIGHTY DUCKS, we cover it all. Subscribe to the show on ITUNES, and enjoy the hell out of this conversation.  Follow Marc on TWITTER @marcmaron, follow Adam @adamraycomedy & Brad @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Jimmy Carr
episodes.summary: The great Jimmy Carr makes his ALN debut, and gives us all a reminder why he's still one of the best in the game! From small shows in the UK, to theaters across the globe, his deadpan delivery and quick one liners have made him not only a favorite among comics, but audiences everywhere. Enjoy this episode with a comedic genius, and check out his new NETFLIX special "Funny Business," available now. Follow Jimmy on TWITTER @JimmyCarr, Adam @adamraycomedy & Brad @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin #7
episodes.summary: Brent Morin returns for his 7th appearance, and again, it's amazing. We talk his life post NETFLIX special, a hilarious political tangent, and his buddy Zach pops in for an inspiring tale of being held up in a religious rehab facility. It'll make you smile, and probably cry, but you'll listen more than once. An instant classic, this episode delivers on every front. Enjoy it, and follow Brent on TWITTER @brentmorin.

episodes.title: ALN - Lamorne Morris
episodes.summary: Lamorne Morris from NEW GIRL stops by to talk growing up in Chicago, his insane audition process for the role of Winston on NEW GIRL, hanging out with Prince, and how one commercial audition changed his life. He's one of the funniest dudes in the business, and is only going to get bigger. Enjoy this hilarious and insightful conversation, go see him in BARBERSHOP THE NEW CUT, watch NEW GIRL when it comes back Tuesday May 10th on FOX, and follow Lamorne on TWITTER @LamorneMorris.

episodes.title: ALN - Susan Sarandon
episodes.summary: Susan Sarandon stops by to talk ping pong, her new movie THE MEDDLER, working with Kevin Costner, and eating weed. She's an academy award winner, a mother, and the sweetest woman on earth. Go see her new movie THE MEDDLER in theaters nation wide May 20th, and follow Susan on TWITTER @SusanSarandon.

episodes.title: ALN - Goo Goo Dolls
episodes.summary: The GOO GOO DOLLS have been killing it for 20 plus years, and grinding in the music business for even longer. In this hilarious, in depth, raw and exclusive 90 minute interview, they touch on everything from touring in a van, to the forming of the band in Buffalo, to how their fans reacted to their style changing, to NAME putting them on the map, performing on Sesame Street, and how IRIS changed their lives. There are a lot of similarities to comedy & music, and we break it all down. Pick up their new album BOXES on May 6th, go see them live this summer, and follow them on TWITTER @googoodolls.

episodes.title: ALN - Eddie Berke
episodes.summary: Eddie Berke has been bartending at The Hollywood Improv since 1979, and is a staple of one of the best comedy clubs in the world. Anyone who spends time there knows Eddie, and the warm, gracious, and friendly demeanor he always demonstrates towards customers and comics alike. Very few know Eddie's background before comedy, as well as the countless stories and experiences he's accumulated from being around comedy greats for 30 plus years. This interview will give you all of that. From Robin Williams, to Andy Kaufman, to Johnny Carson, to helping Nick Swardson fight off drunk fans, to his showbiz family, and his days in Harlem working as a Behavioral counselor, after this episode, you too will love Eddie Berke.

episodes.title: ALN - Hasan Minhaj
episodes.summary: Hasan Minhaj joins us live from the Moontower Comedy Festival in Austin, TX, where he was performing his critically acclaimed one man show, "HOMECOMING KING."  Hasan's one of those guys you root for, and can't help but want to be around. Charismatic, sharp, and honest, he's got the makeup for a great dude, and comedian. This episode is an instant ALN classic, as he candidly tells us about growing up without a Mom for the first 8 years of his life, to his struggles early on to fit in, to how debate/speech class changed his life, and his journey from Northern California to LA, and eventually to NYC for his current job on the "DAILY SHOW." This episode has it all, so enjoy it as much as we did.  Please go see his live show "HOMECOMING KING," whenever you get the chance. It's one of the best live shows around, and follow Hasan on TWITTER @HasanMinhaj.

episodes.title: ALN - Cardiknox
episodes.summary: Cardiknox just got off tour with Carly Rae Jepsen, and are about to take over the pop music scene! Originally from Seattle, the band formed in NYC, and has since gone on to sign with Warner Bros., release a top selling album, have a critical acclaimed music video for their song "ON MY WAY," and get the attention of such big wigs as APPLE & Cyndi Lauper.  An amazing interview with lots of laughs. Go see them live and follow them on TWITTER @cardiknox.

episodes.title: ALN - Jamie Kaler
episodes.summary: Jamie Kaler stops by to talk being a Daddy in 2016, how he went from the military to comedy, his crazy drinking days, and working on the show FRIENDS. He's one of the funniest and most likable guys in the business, so go see him live and follow Jamie on TWITTER @jamiekaler.

episodes.title: ALN - Josh Wolf
episodes.summary: Josh Wolf makes his ALN debut to talk bout his friendship with Larry the Cable Guy, doing comedy for 50k people, living on food stamps with 3 kids, road life with Chelsea Handler, and the defining moment in his life that made him turn up the heat on his career. The energy at the table in this episode is awesome. So many hilarious yet real discussions, Josh will be back again for more no doubt. Follow him on TWITTER @joshwolfcomedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Leonard Ouzts
episodes.summary: Leonard Ouzts is a rising star in the comedy world, and this episode will make you an instant fan. In the past 3 months he's been on CONAN, Adam Devine's HOUSE PARTY, and sold a pilot to MTV! From working at IHOP, to playing  Toto in The Wizard of Oz, to his inspiring grind to Hollywood, Leonard shows why he's one of the funniest up and comers in the business. The great Adam Devine also makes a special guest appearance. Enjoy this episode and follow Leonard on TWITTER @LeonardOutzs.

episodes.title: ALN - Melissa McCarthy
episodes.summary: Melissa McCarthy returns for a bonus exclusive interview with her buddy Adam!  She talks about her hilarious new movie THE BOSS, hosting SNL, getting a star on the Walk of Fame, and her recent lip sync battle with Jimmy Fallon that almost broke the internet. THE BOSS opens April 8th in theaters everywhere! Go see it & follow her on TWITTER @melissamccarthy.

episodes.title: ALN - Dana Carvey #3
episodes.summary: Dana Carvey returns and we couldn't stop laughing!! From Trump, to Hillary, to if Garth ran for President, it's an instant classic. We also get into his traumatic heart surgery, his amazing recovery, how his sons are following in his footsteps, his new NETFLIX special, and USA show "First Impressions." Dana is a legend, a friend, and destroys yet again.  Enjoy this episode & follow him on TWITTER @danacarvey.

episodes.title: ALN - Anjelah Johnson
episodes.summary: Anjelah Johnson is a comedic powerhouse! Her journey into this business is one of the most unique stories you'll ever hear.  She was a cheerleader for the Oakland Raiders, then within 3 months of being in LA she was invited to dance at Michael Jackson's 50th birthday party, had a youtube clip go viral, got on MAD TV, and became a nationally touring headlining comedian. How she handled the early success, and the work ethic she posseses is more than inspiring. She's the sweetest person you'll ever meet, and one of the best comics in the game. Enjoy this episode, and follow Anjelah on TWITTER @anjelahjohnson.

episodes.title: ALN - Retta
episodes.summary: Retta was a standout on PARKS & REC, but she was originally just featured background! That story, along with her early standup days, meeting Amy Poehler for the first time,  and why she left a career in Chemistry at DUKE to pursue acting, makes this episode a repeat listen for sure! You're gonna love her as much as we do. Enjoy the hell out of this one, and follow Retta on TWITTER @unfoRETTABLE.

episodes.title: ALN - LIVE w/ Harland Williams & Iliza Shlesinger!
episodes.summary: Harland Williams & Iliza Shlesinger straight up killed it on the 2nd LIVE ALN podcast! Recorded at the Hollywood Improv in Los Angeles, CA, they discussed about airplane etiquette, Cher's Twitter page, porn stars, Scooby Doo, favorite holidays, why Brad is apparently the gatekeeper for Dwarf pussy, and Adam's funny interactions from High School friends who are loving he & Iliza's new TBS show "Separation Anxiety," Tuesday's at 10p on TBS! This episode is fun from start to finish, so enjoy the hell out of it, make sure you're subscribed on ITUNES, and follow our guests on TWITTER @harlandwilliams & @iliza.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris Franjola
episodes.summary: Chris Franjola makes his ALN debut and is just as hilarious as he is on stage! From Chelsea Lately, to his life in construction, to be & Brad being Eskimo brothers, we had laughs from start to finish. Enjoy this one, and follow Chris on TWITTER @chrisfranjola.

episodes.title: ALN - Quincy Jones
episodes.summary:
Quincy Jones is hilarious comedian from Seattle, WA, who was diagnosed with 
Mesothelioma last July, and given only a year to live. His inspiring fight will not only move you, but make you laugh, and sharpen your appreciation of life. The support from the comedy community has been incredible, with people such as Ellen Degeneres, Bill Burr, and Judd Apatow throwing a helping hand.  On April 4th, Quincy is going to live out his dream and shoot an hour standup special at the Teragram Ballroom in Los Angeles. Tickets are available at teragramballroom.com.  Enjoy this amazing conversation, and follow Quincy on TWITTER @LLQJ206.

episodes.title: ALN - Thomas Ian Nicholas
episodes.summary: Thomas Ian Nicholas stops by to share some crazy AMERICAN PIE stories, his first time to Amsterdam with the cast, starring in ROOKE OF THE YEAR at age 12, how he and Brad met at some rich guy's birthday party, and his upcoming international tour with The Thomas Nicholas Band! A stellar human being, and so much fun to talk to, this episode became an instant classic. Go check out his band at TINband.com, and follow Thomas on TWITTER @TINBand.

episodes.title: ALN - Eleanor Kerrigan
episodes.summary: Eleanor Kerrigan makes her ALN debut to discuss coming up in the boys club of the Comedy Store, touring with Andrew Dice Clay, her tag-team wrestling days, dealing with an unsupportive father her whole life, and some really great behind the scenes stories while waitressing at The Comedy Store under the great Mitzi Shore. Eleanor is one of the best in the game, and if you have a chance to see her live, you must do it! Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow her on TWITTER @ejkerrigan.

episodes.title: ALN  - Justin Hires
episodes.summary: Comedian Justin Hires is about to blow up! His new show RUSH HOUR, based on the movie with Chris Tucker & Jackie Chan, premieres March 31st on CBS! Justin tells us how YOUTUBE helped kickstart his career, making kids laugh on the playground doing Bill Cosby impressions, and how he turned down a job as an MTV VJ, to make the move to LA. He's a rising star, with strong comedic chops, and was so fun to interview. Get on the Justin Hires bandwagon, and follow him on TWITTER @justinhires.

episodes.title: ALN - Dave Attell
episodes.summary: The great Dave Attell makes his ALN debut, and we couldn't be more excited! From porn, to starting comedy in the trenches of NYC, to waiting tables, to his stance on comedy's current state, it's one of those interviews you'll want to listen to more than once. He's got some really great Mitch Hedberg stories too. Dave is a legend, and a hero to a lot of comics, including us. Follow him on TWITTER @attell, follow the podcast on TWITTER @alnpodcast, follow Adam @adamraycomedy & Brad @funnybrad. Be sure to check adamraytv.com & bradwilliamscomedy.com for all upcoming standup tour dates, email your ALN fan stories to aboutlastnightpod@gmail.com for a chance to win "ALN FAN OF THE WEEK," and oh yeah, enjoy this fantastic episode!

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Devine #2
episodes.summary: Adam Devine returns to talk his new movie MIKE & DAVE starring him and Zac Efron, the crazy ideas they have to promote the movie, the best parts of making season 3 of his hit standup showcase show HOUSE PARTY, premiering March 3rd on COMEDY CENTRAL, the Clippers new Condor mascot, and breaks down the formula for writing a hit 90's punk song. He's one of the best dudes and comedians out there, and he's about to blow the fuck up! Always the funnest when he's here, enjoy this episode, and follow Adam on TWITTER @ADAMDEVINE.

episodes.title: ALN - Beck Bennett
episodes.summary: SNL's Beck Bennett makes his ALN debut, and doesn't dissapoint! Beck discusses acting school with Adam at USC, moving from small town midwest to big city LA, how he landed the sweet gig of the AT&T spokesmen, his journey to SNL, and how fun Orange County bro's are to impersonate. Beck is one of the greatest dudes, and to Adam, the funniest guy on earth. Enjoy the hell out of this episode, and follow Beck on TWITTER @becbenit.

episodes.title: ALN - Oscar Preview BONUS!
episodes.summary: Tony Danza, Johnny Depp & Jay Leno ( Adam Ray ) is joined by Christian Bale, Tom Hanks, Vince Vaughn, John Lithgow, Seth Rogen, Jeff Bridges, ( Jonathan Kite ) and Donald Trump, Gene Wilder, Gary Busey, David Letterman, Dustin Hoffman, and Kevin Spacey, ( Jeff Richards ) in this completely improvised OSCAR PREVIEW SHOW!! Untold stories, Oscar predictions, and hilarious banter between some of Hollywood's biggest stars! Enjoy this bonus episode, and follow Jon & Jeff on TWITTER @jbkite & @thejeffrichards.

episodes.title: ALN - Jimmy Pardo
episodes.summary: The great Jimmy Pardo stops by to talk being apart of the amazing comedy scene in Chicago, how he can't stand the word farts, hanging out with Tom Hanks, his first appearance on the TONIGHT SHOW, and warming up the Conan O'Brien show for 4 years. Jimmy's one of the quickest minds in Hollywood, and a new fan favorite on the podcast! Go see him live, and follow him on TWITTER @jimmypardo.

episodes.title: ALN - David Koechner & Josh Macuga
episodes.summary: David Koechner stops by to talk fatherhood, his favorite ANCHORMAN moments, working with Adam McKay, and starting comedy in Chicago with legends. We got David for about 30 minutes before he had to do a set downstairs, but he'll be back for a full hour! Then we are joined by the hilarious host of the talk show BETWEEN THE SHEETS, Josh Macuga! We talk Ronda Rousey, the best movies of the year, and the greatest Tom Selleck story in the world. So many laughs in this one, so follow David Koechner on TWITTER @davidkoechner & Josh Macuga @joshmacuga.

episodes.title: ALN - Matt Braunger
episodes.summary: The great Matt Braunger makes his ALN debut to discuss awful commercial auditions, how Letterman changed his life, his amazing parents, starting the BridgeTown Comedy Festival in Portland, and drops some killer knowledge for up and coming comics. Matt is one of the best in the game, and adored by all comics. A genuinely great dude, we know you'll enjoy this episode as much as we did. Follow Matt on TWITTER @braunger.

episodes.title: ALN - Sandy Danto, Bret Ernst and Mark Gordon
episodes.summary: Adam flies solo this week, LIVE from the Hollywood Improv in Los Angeles, CA! Brad was on the road in Denver, so Adam is joined by comedian and podcast favorite Sandy Danto, comedy beast Bret Ernst, and comedy agent/podcast first timer, Mark Gordon. This episode has so many laughs per minute, and 90's references per second! From Leonardo Dicaprio's GROWING PAINS days, to late night internet searches, to old school Pizza Hut commercials, Donald Trump, and Sandy announces a big adventure! Enjoy this bonus ep, and follow the guys on TWITTER @breternst & @sandydanto!

episodes.title: ALN - Jerry Ferrara #2
episodes.summary: Jerry Ferrara returns to talk prison shows, pickup basketball etiquette, shares some amazing Golden Globes behind the scenes stories, and joins the boys in a cereal movie franchise discussion that got serious real fast:) Grab a drink and enjoy this fun ass episode, and follow Jerry on TWITTER @jerryferrara.

episodes.title: ALN - Beth Stelling
episodes.summary: The great Beth Stelling stops by for a hilarious conversation about growing up in Ohio, her Dad's crazy awesome costume business, dick pics, and her approach to writing jokes, even when they go wrong. She's one of the best in the game, and as sweet as she is funny. A unique mind you'll love to get to know, so follow Beth on TWITTER @BethStelling.

episodes.title: ALN - Blake Anderson
episodes.summary: Blake Anderson stops by to talk WORKAHOLICS season 6, filming the movie DOPE, some crazy Hawaii stories with Adam Ray, and his love for Home Improvement. Non stop laughs in this one. Enjoy it and follow Blake on TWITTER @uncleblazer.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam BONUS!
episodes.summary: In this special bonus ep, the boys discuss sex therapists, why Dr. Phil never counseled Nintendo characters, Jay Leno's deep thoughts, and the process that Brad Williams went through before he tapes his 2nd one hour standup special this Saturday January 16th at 8pm at The Alex Theater in Glendale, CA! And guess what?? You can be there! Go to www.alextheatre.org and get your tix NOW! It's gonna be a helluva night that you won't forget. Enjoy this bonus ep and follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Nick Swardson
episodes.summary: Nick Swardson makes his ALN debut, and absolutely crushes it!! From being expelled from school four times, to partying with Dave Matthews, becoming buds with Adam Sandler, and liking sports way too much, this interview became an instant ALN classic. Nick is one of the most genuine guys in comedy, with so many stories you won't hear anywhere else!! Enjoy this episode like we did, and follow Nick on TWITTER @nickswardson.

episodes.title: ALN - Brian Moses
episodes.summary: Brian Moses stops by to talk about creating the ROAST BATTLE at the World Famous Comedy Store in LA, arguably one of the hottest and most popular shows in the country right now. His journey as a military kid, to San Diego, to a pregnancy scare that propelled a career in comedy, his stories and clever banter will make you an instant fan! Brian is a great guy, and a comic to definitely watch in the coming years. Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow him on TWITTER @racebanning.

episodes.title: ALN - Best Of #2
episodes.summary: Volume TWO of The Best of About Last Night is here! Thank you to everyone who supported the podcast in 2015! You can follow the guys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Rus Gutin
episodes.summary: Rus Gutin is a firecracker of a person, and a hilarious comedian. His voice alone makes you want to listen the insane shit that may come out of his mouth. From fatherhood, to writing musicals, to starting comedy in LA, and how superhero movies gave him hope in the hospital, you'll be a fan after these stories. Check out his special LEGAL GUARDIAN a and follow him on TWITTER @RusGutin.

episodes.title: ALN - Jaleel White and Guy Torry
episodes.summary: Jaleel White returns and brings hilarious comedian Guy Torry with him  to give us a break down of the "black Xmas!" We haven't laughed this hard in a long time. From the food, to the music, the unique traditions, heartfelt family stories, and the worst gifts of all time, these guys were a dynamic duo. Plus an amazing Family Matters story you won't hear anywhere else. Enjoy this one as much as we did, and follow them on Twitter @jaleewhite & @guytorry. Happy Holidays!

episodes.title: ALN - Tiffany Haddish
episodes.summary: Tiffany Haddish is a comedy superstar! Her journey into this business is one of the most awe-inspiring stories you'll ever hear. From foster care at 13, to joining the Laugh Factory comedy camp to avoid psychiatric therapy, to how she manifested her role on NBC's THE CARMICHAEL SHOW, and the greatest sex story of all time, this episode may just be your favorite. Tiffany is on of the sweetest, and hardest working people in the biz, and it's about time to fall in love with her. Follow Tiffany on TWITTER @TiffanyHaddish.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin #6
episodes.summary: Brent Morin returns for his record setting 6th appearance on the ALN podcast, and he delivers yet again! Along side his best friend Matt, the two share stories of their childhood, how they first met, crazy work characters, bar fights, and how he might have a kid on the way. We may have been drinking. Don't miss Brent's NETFLIX special called "I'm Brent Morin," available for streaming Dec 1st! And follow Brent on TWITTER @brentmorin.

episodes.title: ALN - Andrew Santino #3
episodes.summary: Andrew Santino returns for another non-stop laugh filled interview! From creating dwarfdick.com, to telling us about working with Jim Carrey, to his thoughts on weed legalization, it's another ALN INSTANT CLASSIC. Andrew has a Comedy Central Half-Hour special coming out 11/28 that you need to watch, and his debut comedy album on 11/27 that you need to get! He's a comedy beast, and a rising star.  Enjoy this episode & follow him on TWITTER @cheetosantino.

episodes.title: ALN - Jon Rudnitsky
episodes.summary: Jon Rudnitsky is the newest cast member on SNL, and 2 hours after he found out, he came stopped by the podcast to tell us the story!! He dreamt about this job his entire life, and at 25, it's real. From acting school at USC, to making viral videos on YouTube, and how one Dirty Dancing bit changed his life, this podcast will not only make you laugh and fall in love with him, but may also inspire you along the way. Enjoy this special episode, watch him on SNL, and follow Jon on TWITTER @JonRudnitsky.

episodes.title: ALN - Joshua Meyrowitz
episodes.summary: Joshua Meyrowitz is an up-and-coming comic, with Aspergers/high functioning Autism. We were thrilled to sit down with him, as he is just as hilarious as he is sweet, and so fun to be around. From movies, to his favorite types of Japanese porn, to dealing with Autism at an early age, and how The Comedy Store saved his life, I dare you not to feel feelings and laugh extremely hard during this special, no pun intended, episode. Follow Josh on TWITTER @AutisticThunder.

episodes.title: ALN - Jay Mohr
episodes.summary: Jay Mohr makes his first appearance on the ALN pod, and delivers like he does in every facet of his life. From his SNL days, to his dominance in sports radio,  maintaing a top level in the standup game, and the greatest Tom Cruise story you'll ever hear, this one quickly will become a fan favorite! Enjoy, and follow Jay on TWITTER @JayMohr37.

episodes.title: ALN - Howie Mandel
episodes.summary: Howie Mandel makes a special appearance and shares some incredibles stories about how Bobby's World was created, voicing a Gremlin, how DEAL OR NO DEAL almost didn't happen, and gives some amazing insights into a career that spans over 30 years, and started in a comedy club in Canada. Howie is the fucking man, and we know you'll have as much fun listening to this as we did talking to him. Follow Howie on TWITTER @HowieMandel.

episodes.title: ALN - The Best of About Last Night!
episodes.summary: For this very special 200th episode we take a walk down memory lane and listen to some of the best and funniest moments from The About Last Night Podcast! Thank you so much to everybody who listens! You can follow the guys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad

episodes.title: ALN - Live from the Hollywood Improv!
episodes.summary: ALN is LIVE from the Hollywood Improv in Los Angeles, CA! In the first LIVE podcast, the boys welcome Brent Morin, Owen Benjamin and Joey McIntyre in this wild and hilarious evening! From Undateable Live, to rapping in front of LL Cool J, to more stories from the New Kids on The Block cruise, to singing Jaden Smith tweets, to some improvised songs with Owen, you won't be disappointed! Subscribe to the show on ITUNES and follow Brent on TWITTER @BrentMorin. Follow Owen @OwenBenjamin, and Joey @JoeyMcIntyre.

episodes.title: ALN - Dana Carvey #2
episodes.summary: Dana Carvey returns to tell stories from the SNL 40th reunion, how Frank Sinatra died next to him in the hospital, how the Church Lady helped him handle a heckler, and his worst gig ever. It's over an hour of laughs and insights. Enjoy it and follow Dana on TWITTER @danacarvey.

episodes.title: ALN - NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK Cruise Recap
episodes.summary: Adam survived the NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK concert cruise, and sits Brad down to tell about it. From parasailing, to comedy for 3000 women, to partying with the most popular boy band of all time, this is a special episode you shouldn't miss. Follow the boys on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Jeff Garlin
episodes.summary: Jeff Garlin stops by to talk about throwing out the first pitch at Wrigley Field, his concern for Brad at concerts, being roommates with Conan O'Brien, the possibility of Curb Your Enthusiasm returning, and his love for improvisational comedy. It's one of our best episodes yet. Enjoy it as much as we did, and follow Jeff on Instagram @JeffGarlin.

episodes.title: ALN - David Fynn
episodes.summary: David Fynn is one of the world's sweetest gentlemen, and one of the stars of NBC's hit show UNDATEABLE! Which returns Oct 9th for all LIVE episodes. We discuss his transition from England to the US, working with standup comedians, meeting Willow, and Brad introduces us to the horribly hilarious Twitter account of Jaden Smith. Too many laughs in this one. We know you'll enjoy it as much as we did. Follow David on TWITTER @DavidFynn.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam go solo this week, as they make two BIG announcements! You don't wanna miss this one! They also discuss Adam's trip to Texas, visiting with his aunt and her 100 year old friends, Brad's love for Peyton Manning, and of course, two big surprises!! Enjoy this special bonus episode, and follow the boys on TWITTER @funnybrad & @adamraycomedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Payman Benz
episodes.summary: Payman Benz stops by to talk about his insane journey to Los Angeles, his obsession with Jose Canseco, how he started directing comedy, and his recent experience with Miley Cyrus at the VMA's. So much fun in this one from top to bottom. Payman is a rising star in the comedy community, and a hilarious dude. Follow him on TWITTER @PaymanBenz.

episodes.title: ALN - Mark Serritella #3
episodes.summary: Mark Serritella returns to discuss his week in Vegas with Adam, how his brother tried to have him arrested, and his craziest hook up story. Mark always delivers, and this episode is no different. It was laughs from beginning to end. Follow Mark on TWITTER @MarkSerritella.

episodes.title: ALN - Nick Youssef
episodes.summary: Nick Youssef stops by to talk about his getting kicked out of High School, becoming an arcade champion, and his new album STOP NOT OWNING THIS on ITUNES. Nick is born and raised in LA, and a hilarious comic! Go see him live any chance you get and follow him on TWTITTER @NickYoussef.

episodes.title: ALN - Tehran
episodes.summary: Tehran is one of the most interesting people on the planet. From promoting clubs in DC when he was 15, to almost being the voice of Winnie the Pooh, to growing up with an Iranian father and a black mother, his stories are hilarious, his point of view is unique, and he's a gangsta on the basketball court. Follow Tehran on TWITTER @IamTehran.

episodes.title: ALN - Puddin (Adam' s Mom) Returns!
episodes.summary: PUDDIN makes her triumphant return to the podcast, and again, crushes it. We talk childhood TV crushes, Brad and I both losing our voices, and Puddin introduces us to some of the funniest mom catch phrases you?ll ever hear! This was a fun one from start to finish. Subscribe on ITUNES & follow us on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Jonathan Kite #3
episodes.summary: Jonathan Kite returns for the 3rd time, and it may be the best one yet!! We couldn't stop laughing the whole time as we interviewed Donald Trump, Jeff Bridges, Christian Bale, Seth Rogan, Tom Hanks, then analyzed a never before heard Casey Kasem meltdown clip, and talked about the upcoming 5th season of his hit show TWO BROKE GIRLS on CBS. This episode quickly became an ALN all timer. Enjoy it, and follow Jonathan on TWITTER @jbkite.

episodes.title: ALN - Ruben Paul
episodes.summary: Ruben Paul stops by to talk about growing up near Compton, with Haitian parents, how he found comedy and began writing for big name acts, and how at almost 20 years in, he's found his true voice on stage. One of the funniest guys in the biz, with stories you won't believe. This became a quick ALN favorite. Go see Ruben live on stage, and follow him on TWITTER @IamRubenPaul.

episodes.title: ALN - Tony Hinchcliffe
episodes.summary: Tony Hinchcliffe stops by to talk about how getting teased as a kid in Ohio shaped his comedic mind, meeting Jeff Ross & writing for the Comedy Central Roasts, getting a job at The World Famous Comedy Store in LA, the creation of his incredibly popular podcast KILL TONY, and shares some really great insight about how hanging out late night at comedy clubs can be just as important as getting up on stage. Tony is a great dude, and one of the top young writers in the business. Follow him on TWITTER @TonyHinchcliffe, and remember this name, because you'll be hearing much more of it very soon.

episodes.title: ALN - Pete Williams
episodes.summary: In a very special episode, Brad sits down and interviews his father, Pete Williams for the podcast. They talk about what it was like raising a son with dwarfism, Pete's time running one of the hottest punk rock clubs in Southern California, battling and defeating cancer, and even share a Ducktails connection. You can definitely see where Brad gets his sense of humor from in this episode. If you have kids, are thinking about having kids, or ever watched a kid's show on Saturday mornings, this episode is a must listen. Enjoy!

episodes.title: ALN - Maz Jobrani
episodes.summary: Maz Jobrani has taken his act all over the world! From Saudi Arabia to Sweeden, his stories are incredible. From his move to LA, to his thoughts on the middle east, to getting the nickname "The Persian Pink Panther," it's no wonder he's one of the best in the game. Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow Maz on TWITTER @MazJobrani.

episodes.title: ALN - Erik Myers
episodes.summary: Erik Myers stops by with some of the craziest stories you'll ever hear on a podcast.  He knew he was gonna be a comic when he was a child. It's what separated him from the pack, put a stop to the teasing  and ultimately, saved his life. From starting standup in Maryland, to performing for only the second time in front of thousands for a BET taping, to his battles with sobriety in LA, that led to him sleeping in bushes for a whole week, his inspiring story will make you cry. Remember this name and get on the bandwagon now, cause soon the whole world will. Follow Erik on TWITTER @erikmyerscomedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Fortune Feimster
episodes.summary: Fortune Feimster is a rising star in the comedy scene, and one of the chillest, most likable people on planet earth! Her journey to LA is pretty incredible. From her college graduation speech, to becoming a writer on Chelsea Lately, to meeting Tina Fey, to making a sitcom about her family, and crushing it with her standup all over the world, you'll be hearing a lot more from her very soon. Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow our hilarious friend on TWITTER @fortunefunny.

episodes.title: ALN - Steve-O #2
episodes.summary: Steve-O returns, and brings some of the best stories we've heard on this podcast! Too many laughs in this one, as we hear how he got in trouble with Sea World, lit his asshole on fire, the origins of how his craziness began, how Jared from Subway is fucking up his act, and his first hour standup special that is coming out soon! He's a great dude, and so fun to chat with. You're gonna love this one. Subscribe to his hilarious YouTube channel, and follow him on TWITTER @stevo.

episodes.title: ALN - Jessica Chaffin
episodes.summary: Jessica Chaffin stops by to talk meeting Adam on THE HEAT, her problems with Jurassic World, moving to LA from NYC on Sept. 10th, 2001, and what sexual positions are the most flattering for men. She's one of the funniest people you'll talk to on planet earth, as proven in her hilarious podcast RONNA & BEVERLY! Subscribe, listen, laugh, and follow Jess on TWITTER @JessicaChaffin.

episodes.title: ALN - Michael Rapaport
episodes.summary: Michael Rapaport has been in more TV shows and Films than anybody on the planet. Well, at least it feels that way. From TRUE ROMANCE, to THE HEAT, to COPLAND, to NYPD BLUE, to LOUIE, to BASKETBALL DIARIES, his journey into the business is unlike any you'll ever hear. A shit talking kid from NYC that just wanted to be in the NBA, that somehow found his way into standup, and eventually Hollywood. His stories about making the Tribe Called Quest documentary, meeting Christopher Walken, and a Dave Chappelle story you'll only hear on the ALN podcast. Your'e gonna love this one as much as we did. Follow Michael on TWITTER @MichaelRapaport.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin #5
episodes.summary:
Brent Morin returns for a record 5th time on the ALN podcast, and we couldn't be more pumped! From kissing Ed Sheeran on UNDATEABLE, to filming his one hour special, Brent kills it again. The boys drink white wine, talk about romantic movies, bullies, Danny Glover commercials, and prank Brent in a way you'll never believe. Enjoy, laugh, and love this one as much as we did, and follow Brent on TWITTER @brentmorin.
Go to http://DraftKings.com now and enter promo code ALN to play for free!

episodes.title: ALN - Brett Riley
episodes.summary: Brett Riley stops to by to talk about growing up in Kansas, how he discovered he could sing R&B & make people think he was black, commuting from a wine country to LA to pursue his dreams, and the wild night he and Adam had when they first met. It's one of the most fun episodes we've done, and Brett is a rising star that'll make you laugh, and wanna hang out with. Get his album I'M AN IDIOT, and enjoy this one. Follow Brett on TWITTER @BrettRiley.

episodes.title: ALN - Bald Bryan
episodes.summary: Bald Bryan stops by to discuss being a contestant on WHO WANTS TO BE A MILLIONAIRE, how he got the job on the Adam Carolla podcast, and his incredibly inspiring story of getting diagnosed with a brain tumor, surviving against all odds, and how he currently lives with it today. Bryan is one of the greatest dudes you'll meet and his story is unlike anything you'll ever hear on this podcast. Love your life, and enjoy this fantastic episode of ALN. Get his new book SHRINKAGE, an follow Bryan on Twitter @BaldBryan.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Turns 33
episodes.summary: The boys go NO GUEST in this special bonus episode, as Adam Ray turned 33 on June 16th, 2015! In the midst of a crazy day filled with show pitches, Hyundai, standup shows, and drinking, the boys sit down to celebrate the day Adam came into this world. Is Adam pretty drunk the whole time? Yes. Is it hilarious? Yes. Does Brad do a great job commentating on his lack of sobriety during this episode? Yes. Enjoy.

episodes.title: ALN - Tone Bell
episodes.summary: Tone Bell is a rising star in the comedy world. From his roles on NBC's WHITNEY, BAD JUDGE, Chelsea Lately, Comedy Central's @midnight and his new half hour special, you'll be hearing a lot more of this guy very soon. In this hilarious episode, Tone shares his favorite baby making music playlist, how he left a marketing job at Anheuser Busch to pursue comedy, and his new show opposite Mark Paul Gosselaar ( Zack Morris ) coming to NBC this fall! He's a helluva comic, and an even better dude. Subscribe to the show on ITUNES, and follow Tone on TWITTER @tonebell.

episodes.title: ALN - Owen Smith
episodes.summary: Owen Smith is one of the best standup comics in the game. He's written for Everybody Hates Chris, countless award shows, been in several big TV commercials, and his new standup special GOOD LUCK EVERYBODY is something everyone should watch! From growing up in the Bahamas, to keeping his dreams of comedy a secret, and how influential his single Mom was, this episode will quickly become a favorite. Go get his new special, and follow Owen on TWITTER @OwenSmith4real.

episodes.title: ALN - Doug Ellin
episodes.summary: Doug Ellin created ENTOURAGE, one of the best shows to ever be on television, and we were pumped he made time to stop by the podcast. He's a real solid dude, and talked to us about his early standup days in NYC, working his way up the mailroom, becoming buds with Russell Wilson, and creating a powerhouse HBO show. THE ENTOURAGE movie is in theaters NOW! Go see it. It's a fun fucking ride! Then follow Doug on TWITTER @mrdougellin.

episodes.title: ALN - Billy Gardell
episodes.summary: Billy Gardell stops by to talk about booking MIKE & MOLLY with $7 in his bank account, the amazing story how he met his wife, and performing standup in a strip club. He's one of the nicest guys in comedy, and couldn't have been more fun to talk to! We could've hung out with him for hours. Enjoy. Follow Billy on TWITTER @BillyGardell.

episodes.title: ALN - Sam Richardson
episodes.summary: Sam Richardson is a star. He and Adam met in Budapest while filming SPY, and through booze and laughs, bonded immediately. He's one of the funniest dudes in the biz, and a great dude. In this fun episode, Sam tells us about his role in the hit HBO series VEEP, growing up in GHANA, and how Second City in Chicago changed his life. It's a classic from top to bottom. Follow Sam on TWITTER @SamRichardson9.

episodes.title: ALN - Brian Redban
episodes.summary: Brian Redban stops by to talk about how being tech savvy in his basement in small town Ohio, took him to working for Joe Rogan in LA, meeting Kurt Cobain on acid, why he loves the Olive Garden, and having sex in car while driving it. A comedy journey unlike any we've heard, and drug stories that'll blow your mind. Get to know the hilarious and innovative Brian Redban. Follow Brian on TWITTER @redban.

episodes.title: ALN - Jason Collings
episodes.summary: Jason Collings is a comedy beast, but his journey might be the craziest you'll ever hear from a comedian. From an R&B producer, to owning a martial arts studio, to starting comedy at 40 with 2 kids, to getting discovered by Jo Koy, you'll be both entertained and inspired from this episode. Follow Jason on TWITTER @JasonCollings.

episodes.title: ALN - Brady Matthews
episodes.summary: Brady Matthews has been on Jimmy Kimmel Live, It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia, How I Met Your Mother, and numerous TV and print ads, because he's probably the best looking comic in Hollywood. Brady stops by for his first appearance and shares hilarious high school party stories, his first fight in the library, how his football career came to an end, growing up around Michael Jordan, and how Second City in Chicago started his comedy journey. Brady is one of the most fun guys you'll meet, and a down right hilarious comedian. Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow Brady on TWITTER @BradyMatthews13.

episodes.title: ALN - Marc Summers
episodes.summary: DOUBLE DARE was one of the greatest game shows in the history of the world, and the man who is responsible for it's success and popularity, is Marc Summers. One of the best podcasts in ALN history, Marc stops by to talk about his early days as a standup comic with Letterman, Leno and Robin Williams, auditioning for DOUBLE DARE, how the show was made, how he got involved with the Food Network, what Oprah smells like, and getting in a fight with Burt Reynolds. So many laughs in this episode, and stories that you won't hear anyone else. He's one of the nicest guys around, and it's no wonder people have wanted to be in business with him for 40 plus years. Follow Marc on Twitter @lbatvmc.

episodes.title: ALN - Jay Montepare
episodes.summary: Jay Montepare is a hilarious comic, a great a dude, and the host of Ellen's DESIGN CHALLENGE on HGTV. Jay shares great stories from the road, how he was handpicked by Ellen Degeneres, and the most insane first time doing standup story you'll ever hear. Subscribe to the show on ITUNES, and follow Jay on Twitter @JayMontepare.

episodes.title: ALN - Brian Scolaro
episodes.summary: Brian Scolaro is one of planet earth's funniest standup comedians. From growing up funny in NYC, to acting with Pam Anderson, to talking with Michael Richards days before his racist rant at the Laugh Factory, Brian's stories and voice will keep you engaged for hours. He's one of the best in the business, and if you can see him live, you must do so! Get his albums on ITUNES and follow him on Twitter @Brian_Scolaro

episodes.title: ALN - Peter Segal
episodes.summary: Peter Segal has directed many of your favorite comedy movies. TOMMY BOY, 50 FIRST DATES, NUTTY PROFESSOR THE KLUMPS, THE LONGEST YARD, GET SMART, GRUDGE MATCH, ANGER MANAGEMENT and NAKED GUN 33 1/3. If you love comedy, and great unheard stories about Adam Sandler, Eddie Murphy, Chris Farley, David Spade, Robert Deniro and Jack Nicholson, then grab a glass of merlot, get comfy in your snuggie, and enjoy the shit out of this incredible episode. Follow Peter on Twitter @pete_segal.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Devine Tour Recap
episodes.summary: In this special bonus episode, Adam Ray is joined by Adam Devine, and tour manager Kyle Walsh, to recap the 30 city ADAM DEVINE STANDUP tour the three embarked on from Feb 10th - March 8th 2015. None of them had ever done anything like this. The stories are hilarious, the shows were insane, and the friendships are for a lifetime. Follow the boys on Twitter @ADAMDEVINE & @Goonssquad.

episodes.title: ALN - Kirk Huffman
episodes.summary: In this special bonus episode, Adam's childhood buddy and rising music star Kirk Huffman, stops by to talk about how they met in 7th grade cartooning class, how they took over their High School news program in Seattle, life on the road, and breaks down his current band, THE REAL DON. He's one of the most solid dudes on planet earth, and an incredible musician. Check out his music at realdonmusic.com & follow Kirk on Twitter @therealdonmusic.

episodes.title: ALN - Harland Williams #3
episodes.summary: The great Harland Williams makes his 3rd appearance on the podcast, and it may be the funniest. We talk about cereal mascots as Presidents, his new sitcom in Canada, the best pranks he's ever pulled, and debuts some of his new music he made with the Barenaked Ladies. He's one of the nicest, most hilarious dudes on the planet, so sit back & enjoy. Follow Harland on Twitter @HarlandWilliams.

episodes.title: ALN - Jade Catta-Preta
episodes.summary:
Jade Catta-Preta is one of the sweetest, funniest people on the earth. In this episode she tells us about growing up in Brazil, her struggles with learning the English language, falling in love with standup comedy, being on MTV's GIRL CODE, living in NYC, and improvises a Brazilian musical with the boys, that should be definitely be on Broadway:) 
Jade is a rising star. Enjoy this episode, and follow her on Twitter @thejademovie.

episodes.title: ALN - April Foolishness Recap
episodes.summary: The boys sit down for a BONUS episode, and recap the Kevin & Bean APRIL FOOLISHNESS show at The Shrine, Adam's first @Midnight appearance, and friend of the show Mark Serritella joins them for some comedic commentary on hilarious news stories from this past week. Too many laughs in this one. Follow Mark on Twitter @MarkSeritella.

episodes.title: ALN - Milana Vayntrub
episodes.summary: Milana Vayntrub stops by to tell us about growing up in Uzbekistan, becoming the face of AT&T, her new show on YAHOO called "Other Space," and how our Jewish our mothers are. She's the most adorable person on planet earth, and incredibly funny. Enjoy. Follow Milana on Twitter @MintMilana.

episodes.title: ALN - Justin Martindale
episodes.summary: Justin Martindale is one of the funniest people on planet earth, and we were lucky enough to have him on the show. From being a drunk High School mascot, to becoming friends with Lance Bass, to writing for Joan Rivers, we know this episode will make you an instant fan of his. Go see Justin live, and follow him on Twitter @justmartindale.

episodes.title: ALN - Raj Sharma
episodes.summary: Raj Sharma is one of the nicest, funniest dudes on planet earth, and stops by the podcast for an incredibly entertaining 90 minutes. From growing up with strict Indian parents, to getting arrested, to dating a Dwarf, this one is filled with laughs from top to bottom.  Go see Raj live, and follow him on Twitter @comedianRaj.

episodes.title: ALN - Carlos Mencia
episodes.summary: Carlos Mencia stops by to talk about the incredible story of how he discovered Brad Williams in a comedy club, how he may have isolated himself from the standup community, recounts some funny moments from MIND OF MENCIA that never aired, and gives an amazing breakdown of how he structures a joke. It was hilarious, insightful, and an episode you should not miss. Follow Carlos on Twitter @carlosmencia.

episodes.title: ALN - Andrew Santino #2
episodes.summary: Andrew Santino is a rising star in Hollywood. He returns to the podcast to talk about his first late night appearance on CONAN, how he almost died in Vegas shooting his new TV show, and delivers the first good Adam Ray impression ever.  There's a lotta laughs in this one. Follow Andrew on Twitter @cheetosantino.

episodes.title: ALN - Jodi Miller
episodes.summary: Jodi Miller is a name you need to know. From performing for the troops, to Chelsea Lately, to America's Got Talent, she's made everybody laugh. She stops by the show to tell about the 10 year old comic she mentors, why cats are awesome, and how America's Got Talent changed her life. She's hilarious, she's sexy, and she's on Twitter @jodimillercomic.

episodes.title: ALN - Roy Wood Jr.
episodes.summary: Roy Wood Jr. stops by to share hilarious stories from his radio DJ days, how he beat the Ninja Turtles arcade game on $1.25, starting comedy in Birmingham, Alabama, and ends the show with the greatest prank call you'll ever hear. Follow Roy on Twitter @RoyWoodJr.

episodes.title: ALN - Kevin Biggins
episodes.summary: Kevin Biggins is a writer/producer on Family Guy, and a flat out hilarious human being.  From meeting Adam West, to finding his funny in Oak Park Illinois, to writing the Simpsons/Family Guy crossover episode, this one is full of laughs, 90's references, and a little bit of Danny Glover. Follow Kevin on Twitter @TheBiggIdea.

episodes.title: ALN - Jerrod Carmichael
