episodes.summary: Jerrod Carmichael stops by to talk about growing up in North Carolina, creating his own sitcom with NBC, the experience of making an HBO standup special at The Comedy Store, and drops insights about comedy and life that will keep you thinking for days. He's one of the strongest and most original comedic voices in the game, and after listening to this conversation, you'll understand why Hollywood feels the same. Follow Jerrod on Twitter @NotoriousROD.

episodes.title: ALN - Big Jay Hollingsworth
episodes.summary: Big Jay Hollingsworth is 6 foot 8, hilarious, and knows martial arts. He's lived all over the country, worked crappy day jobs, then worked with some of the biggest names in comedy, has dated a dwarf, and shares the craziest night of standup he & Adam have ever seen. Jay is a rising star, a great storyteller and a big motherfucker. Follow him on Twitter @BigIrishJay.

episodes.title: ALN - Nick Kroll
episodes.summary: Nick Kroll joins us today, and we couldn't be more excited. He plays Ruxin on THE LEAGUE, he's done voices on Family Guy, Life & Times of Tim, been on Parks & Rec, Community, New Girl, countless movies and late night appearances, and has his own sketch show KROLL SHOW, which is in its third & final season on Comedy Central. Nick is one of funniest, nicest guys in the biz, and we were lucky to get a hour of fun with him. Follow Nick on Twitter @nickkroll.

episodes.title: ALN - Amir K
episodes.summary: Amir K is one of the rising stars in the standup comedy world. He's traveled all over the world, he's been on Comedy Central, MTV, and in the movie Argo, and his stories and voices will make you cry laughing. Go see him live, and follow him on Twitter @AmirComedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Mark Serritella #2
episodes.summary: Mark Serritella returns for a hilarious recap of his trip to San Jose with Adam, how he helped his Dad send his first text message, and why the Seahawks will win the Super Bowl. Follow Mark on Twitter @MarkSerritella.

episodes.title: ALN - Dom Irrera
episodes.summary: Dom Irrera is a comedy legend. He's been doing standup for over 30 years, and shares some amazing stories like doing Johnny Carson, hanging out with Robin Williams & Rodney Dangerfield, and why he loves Ireland. Check out his killer podcast DOM IRRERA LIVE AT THE LAUGH FACTORY. Everybody loves Dom, and so will you. Follow him on Twitter @domirrera.

episodes.title: ALN - Jo Koy
episodes.summary: Jo Koy stops by to talk about starting standup in LA, meeting Chelsea Handler, and how impersonating his Mom changed his life. He's one of the best in the business, and proves it today. Brent Ernst & Adam Carolla also stop by to make an appearance. Enjoy this episode as much as we did, and follow Jo on Twitter @Jokoy.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Ray and Brad Williams Bonus
episodes.summary: In this BONUS episode, Brad & Adam recount their magical evening sitting court side at the Lakers game for the first time ever!! From meeting Chris Pratt, to Brad dancing and getting on the jumbo-tron, these are stories you don't wanna miss! Follow them on Twitter @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Sandy Danto & Dylan Avila
episodes.summary: It's the first episode of 2015, and the boys share hilarious stories from a week in Vegas, Brad getting in trouble with TMZ, and welcome pal Sandy Danto to talk about being a wingman if you're married. The guys then discuss the recent attack on Seattle comic Dylan Avila, who miraculously survived, and after brain surgery, had a 15 minute phone call interview that will inspire you, and make you laugh. Follow them on Twitter @DylanAvila & @SandyDanto.

episodes.title: ALN - Nick Thune
episodes.summary: Nick Thune stops by to talk about starting standup in Seattle, getting jumped in Denver, the prank he pulled at his 10 year reunion, getting arrested, working at the Boys & Girls club, and serenades us with a couple Thune originals on the guitar! Great stories, lots of laughs. Hope you enjoy this as much as we did. Follow Nick on Twitter @nickthune.

episodes.title: ALN - Jerry Ferrara
episodes.summary: Jerry Ferrara stops by to talk about the new ENTOURAGE movie, his childhood snow shoveling business, how being on an HBO show changed his life, his sandwich shop FAT SAL'S, and his new podcast BAD 4 BUSINESS. We talk sports, comedy and family, and it's one of the most fun episodes we've ever had. Follow Jerry on Twitter @jerrycferrara.

episodes.title: ALN - Dana Carvey
episodes.summary: Dana Carvey is comedy legend, and this episode is yet another reminder why. From how he created Garth, to working with Phil Hartman, to visiting the White House, to meeting Chris Farley, his stories will blow your mind.  It's 90 minutes of hilarity, complete with a visit from the Church Lady. Follow him on Twitter @danacarvey.

episodes.title: ALN - Tony Danza
episodes.summary: Tony Danza has done it all. From starring on two hit sitcoms, to movies, to hosting his own syndicated talk show, being a professional boxer, and currently starring in the hit musical "Honeymoon in Vegas" on Broadway, we touch it all in this special bonus episode of the About Last Night podcast.  Tony is one of the sweetest, funniest, most talented dudes you'll meet, and was even game for a "Danza on Danza" rapid fire interview with Adam at the end. Go see him on Broadway, and follow him on Twitter @TonyDanza.

episodes.title: ALN - Melissa McCarthy & Ben Falcone
episodes.summary: Comedian, writer and actress Melissa McCarthy and her husband Ben Falcone join Brad Williams and Adam Ray for this very special About Last Night Podcast! It's their first ever podcast, and they brought it from top to bottom! Let them know how much you loved it & follow them on Twitter @Melissaandben!

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin #4
episodes.summary: Brent Morin returns for a record 4th time on the ABLN podcast! Along with our pal David Sullivan, the three recap their 6 day "clooney boop" filled adventures in NYC!  From being a part of the NYC Comedy Festival, to romantically biking though the city at 4am, to karaoke with Dane Cook, to hugging Taylor Swift, grab a drink, cuddle up, and get ready to enjoy a hilarious 90 minutes. Follow them on TWITTER @BrentMorin & @DavidSullivan.

episodes.title: ALN - Andie Bolt
episodes.summary: Comedian Andie Bolt stops by to talk about working at Universal Studios with Adam, how she dealt with bullying as a child, growing up on a farm, and tells us about the incredible documentary she's making about how her Mom, who's been diagnosed with Neuroendocrine cancer, has found comfort in the game World of Warcraft. If you want to be a part of something great, and give back by doing very little, please go to WowMomTheMovie.com, watch the trailer, and support the kickstarter with anything you can. Andie is one of the greatest, funniest, and strongest people I know, and what she's doing for her Mom should not go unnoticed. So please, take a minute and donate a little something. And enjoy this episode, it's one of my favorites. Follow Andie on Twitter @AndieBolt.

episodes.title: ALN - Stephen Kramer Glickman
episodes.summary: Stephen Kramer Glickman stops by to talk about how being on a hit Nickeldeon show got him laid, how Mel Brooks helped him get the role of Shrek on Broadway, and stories from his family that'll make you wish you were a part of it. It's a hilarious episode all the way through. Follow him on Twitter @stephenglickman.

episodes.title: ALN - Pauly Shore
episodes.summary: Pauly Shore stops by to share amazing stories about growing up in The Comedy Store, working for MTV, his podcast Pauly Shore's Interested, and his new documentary that gives an inside look to a side of Pauly we've never seen before. Make sure to check out PAULY SHORE STANDS ALONE December 4th on SHOWTIME and follow him on Twitter @PaulyShore.

episodes.title: ALN - Thomas Dale
episodes.summary: Thomas Dale stops by to talk about his struggles with addiction, how comedy saved his life, and what Pixar character he would like to voice. It's an inspiring and hilarious episode from start to finish. Fall in love with Thomas & follow him on Twitter @ThomasDale5.

episodes.title: ALN - Sebastian Maniscalco
episodes.summary: Sebastian Maniscalco stops by to talk about his new special "Aren't You Embarrassed?", his hilarious Italian hair stylist father, and how a scooter has changed his life. Sebastian is one of the best comics in the world, and we were lucky enough to sit down & laugh with him for an hour. Follow him on Twitter @SebastianComedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Steve Byrne
episodes.summary: Steve Byrne stops by to talk about being popular on MySpace, being the only Asian in his high school, and how his pal Vince Vaughn helped make his show SULLIVAN & SON. It's a hilarious episode you should not miss. Follow him on Twitter @SteveByrnelive.

episodes.title: ALN - Joey McIntyre #2
episodes.summary: Joey McIntyre returns to talk about his new show The McCarthy's on CBS, the NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK getting a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame, and teaches Adam how to not screw up singing the national anthem.  It's a great interview from start to finish. Follow Joey on Twitter @Joeymcintyre.

episodes.title: ALN - Rory Scovel
episodes.summary: Rory Scovel is one of the hottest comics in the biz, and stops by to share hilarious stories about starting comedy in North Carolina, his show GROUND FLOOR on TBS, and his epic appearances on CONAN. Brent Morin fills in for Brad, and yet again, brings the heat. Buckle up. Follow Rory & Brent on Twitter @Roryscovel & @Brentmorin.

episodes.title: ALN - Barry Katz #2
episodes.summary: Barry Katz returns for the SEQUEL to his first appearance! One of the most powerful and influential managers in the business shares more amazing stories from getting Jay Mohr "Jerry Maguire," to coaching Whitney through big auditions, and reliving Brad's recent one hour standup special. Follow Barry on TWITTER @BarryKatz.

episodes.title: ALN - Dane Cook
episodes.summary: Dane Cook returns to the podcast to discuss his first standup special in four years! "TROUBLEMAKER" airs October 17th on SHOWTIME, and Dane shares with us get the process of putting together his seventh hours special, all on his own. We also take a trip down memory lane, and talk about the highs and lows of a career that is heading in a new direction, and still fucking hilarious. If you're a young comic, or just a human being, you'll enjoy this inspiring episode. Follow him on TWITTER @danecook.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Ray and Brad Williams
episodes.summary: Brad is back from SF and Adam couldn't be happier. The boys discuss intelligent San Fran bums, if gay men are into dwarfs, Clooney being single, and Danny Glover makes a special appearance. Lotta laughs in this one. Follow them on Twitter @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin #3
episodes.summary: Brent Morin stops by before season 2 of NBC'S UNDATEABLE starts filming, to fill in for Brad, and talk to Adam about playing guitar with Marc Maron on the Oddball Tour, going to Vegas with Adam Devine, and helps me define a "Clooney Boop." It's always a great time and hilarious, and this episode is no different. Follow Brent on TWITTER @BrentMorin.

episodes.title: ALN - Greg Fitzsimmons
episodes.summary: Greg Fitzsimmons is one of the best comedians in the game. He's written for every show, hangs out with Louis CK, has a new book, his kids don't think he's cool, he gets Adam to talk about getting a handjob on an airplane, and then has the most awkward moment in our podcast's history. Don't miss this one.

episodes.title: ALN - Sam Tripoli
episodes.summary: The amazing Sam Tripoli stops by to talk about how funny changed his life, the battles we had in our comedy basketball league, and how he fused porn and comedy into a magical evening called "The Naughty Show." Get his album BELIEVE IN YOURSELF on ITUNES & follow him on Twitter @SamTripoli.

episodes.title: ALN - Puddin (Adam's Mom)
episodes.summary: Live from Adam's home in Seattle, WA, the boys sit down with the woman who gave birth to this one time theme park character and guest on According to Jim, Adam's Mom!! In this episode, Puddin takes us back to her roots in Oklahoma, discusses the challenges of being a single mom with an aspiring comedian son, picking out Adam's Halloween costumes, embarrassing him during his High School basketball games, and her experience in the Vagina Monologues. It's a must listen. She's an sweet, funny, and the most caring person you'll ever meet. And if you don't know her, now you will. Enjoy!

episodes.title: ALN - Adam and Brad Go To Seattle
episodes.summary: The boys travel to Adam's home in Seattle, where they discuss Brad's first impressions of the Emerald City, the time Adam got called the N-WORD, and Brad's new gig as a radio DJ in San Francisco. Follow them on TWITTER @adamraycomedy & @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Tom Arnold
episodes.summary: Tom Arnold stops by to talk about his friendship with Arnold Schwarzenegger, his struggles with sobriety, and being married to Roseanne. He's a great dude, and gives us one of our more hilarious and insightful episodes. Follow him on Twitter @TomArnold

episodes.title: ALN - Aries Spears
episodes.summary: Aries Spears starred on MadTV, is an unreal impressionist, and one of the best standup comics around. In this hilarious episode, Aries breaks down black & white audiences, does an amazing rap medley of Snoop/Jay Z, talks about meeting Shaq, and prank calls a Thai restaurant as DMX. Listen now!! Follow Aries on Twitter @AriesSpears.

episodes.title: ALN - Remembering Robin Williams
episodes.summary: Robin Williams was brilliant beyond words. He made us laugh and cry so beautifully, for many years. Brad and Adam share their favorite moments and personal stories with the great late comedian, as well as get an in depth analysis of how dangerous depression and addiction can be, from Dr. Drew Pinsky.

episodes.title: ALN - Ben Gleib #2
episodes.summary: One of the funniest men on planet earth, Ben Gleib, stops by to talk about his new game show IDIOT TEST, his fascination for Jay Leno, and why he gets blackout drunk every Xmas at the Hollywood Improv.  Follow him on TWITTER @BenGleib.

episodes.title: ALN - Justin Rupple
episodes.summary: Comedian Justin Rupple stops by to talk Ninja Turtles, middle school talent shows, how he met his wife, how much he loves the podcast, and delivers some of the best impressions you'll ever hear. We laughed almost the whole way through. Follow him on TWITTER @TheRupple.

episodes.title: ALN - Theo Von
episodes.summary: Theo Von stops by with some of the best stories you'll ever hear! From his time on ROAD RULES, to hosting his TBS prank show DEAL WITH IT, to crank texting strangers, you'll wanna listen to this episode multiple times. Theo is a hilarious comic, and a great dude to talk to. Follow him on TWITTER @theovon.

episodes.title: ALN - Pete Holmes
episodes.summary: Pete Holmes hosts an incredible podcast called YOU MADE IT WEIRD, he's considered one of the best standup comics in the game right now, and he stops by to talk about Batman, if he's an ass or a boob man, pushing the envelope in comedy, and the journey of having and then losing his own late night talk show. It's personal, it's engaging, and there are tangents galore that made us cry laughing. You're gonna love it. Follow Pete on TWITTER @PeteHolmes

episodes.title: ALN - Brad is BACK from Brazil!
episodes.summary: Brad is back from Brazil, and shares his adventures with Adam. He almost got kidnapped, he almost had sex with a tranny, and he definitely getting kicked out of an airport bar. The boys laughed almost all the way through this one. You're gonna love it. Follow them on Twitter @funnybrad & @adamraycomedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Barry Katz
episodes.summary: Barry Katz has managed some of the biggest names in Hollywood; Dave Chappelle, Dane Cook, Whitney Cummings, Jay Mohr, Louis CK, Tracy Morgan, and more. And now he's here to talk about it. Don't miss this episode and follow Barry on Twitter @BarryKatz.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Ray and Brent Morin
episodes.summary: With Brad still gone in BRAZIL for the World Cup, Adam asked good pal and friend of the show Brent Morin to fill in. The two have some drinks, share hilarious stories about Conan O'Brien, weird press junkets for Brent's show UNDATEABLE on NBC, come up with a some terrible kids's shows, and finish with an All-4-One duet that will make you cry. Follow Brent on Twitter @Brentmorin

episodes.title: ALN - Pete Davidson
episodes.summary: Pete Davidson was just named one of Variety's TOP 10 Comics to Watch, he's on Guy Code, Brooklyn 99, been on Comedy Central & Jimmy Kimmel Live, and is only 20 years old. He's a great dude, and fucking hilarious. Follow him on Twitter @PeteDavidson.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam and Brad Bonus!
episodes.summary: Brad is about to head off to Brazil to watch The World Cup. He may not return. He may get kidnapped, or lost in a riot, or eaten by prostitutes. So Adam called him on the phone to have one potential last conversation with his best friend.

episodes.title: ALN - Live Episode with Pauly Shore!
episodes.summary: In the first ever LIVE episode of ABOUT LAST NIGHT, Brad and Adam celebrate 100 episodes, reflect on the past 99, get a visit from Interrupting Tony Danza, play some trivia, and welcome a very special guest; Pauly Shore. It's a fun one.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Devine #2
episodes.summary: WORKAHOLICS star Adam Devine is fresh back from a month in New Orleans, and he's got some stories. Filming the 2nd season of his Comedy Central standup show House Party, filming Pitch Perfect 2, watching young kids tweaked on drugs, and hanging out with Blake Griffin. It's a fun one. Follow Adam on Twitter @AdamDevine.

episodes.title: ALN Bonus - Marv Albert
episodes.summary: In this special bonus segment, Adam sits down with long time NBA announcer MARV ALBERT. They talk playoffs, hookers, and Obama. It's great. Enjoy.

episodes.title: ALN - Deon Cole
episodes.summary: CONAN writer & hilarious comedian Deon Cole stops by to talk about starting comedy in Chicago, losing "The Tonight Show," and what Oprah tapings are really like. Great stories and humble beginnings, Deon is one of a kind. Follow him on Twitter @DeonCole.

episodes.title: ALN - Rick Glassman
episodes.summary: RICK GLASSMAN is one of the stars of NBC's new show UNDATEABLE. He's one of the most unique comedians out there, and shares stories of playing basketball with Lebron James, his obsession with Magic: The Gathering cards, and how he charmed his way onto a network sitcom. It's a fun episode from top to bottom. Follow Rick on twitter @RickGlassman.

episodes.title: ALN Classic! (Originally Recorded 5-6-13)
episodes.summary: In this CLASSIC ALN episode, the boys talk about Brad's first acting job on Nickelodeon, Adam getting in trouble as Wolverine, and we hear Adam's 3 year old nieces talk about Justin Beiber. It's a fun one. Listen for your country. Happy Memorial Day!

episodes.title: ALN - Francisco Ramos
episodes.summary: Francisco Ramos stops by to talk about growing up in Venezuela, learning to speak English, starting comedy in the US, and his most embarrassing moment ever. He's hilarious and our most cultured guest yet. Don't miss it. Follow him on Twitter @FramosComedy

episodes.title: ALN - Tom Segura
episodes.summary: Tom Segura stops by to talk about being married to a comedian, using humor to find acceptance as he moved from school to school as a kid, and what it was like to do so many drugs that you fall into a coma. He's hilarious, he's an amazing story teller, and his new hour special COMPLETELY NORMAL is on ITUNES & Netflix now. Get it. Watch it. We love this guy. Follow him on Twitter @tomsegura.?

episodes.title: ALN - Mo Mandel
episodes.summary: Mo Mandel is hilarious. His high energy and sharp wit is the reason he's been on multiple TV shows, Chelsea Lately, and has his own half hour Comedy Central special. He stops by the podcast to talk about growing up with ADD in a city of 2,000 people, talking his way out of speeding tickets, and gets a visit from Tony Danza.

episodes.title: ALN CLASSIC - Chris D'Elia
episodes.summary: In this classic throwback episode, rising star Chris D'Elia makes his first appearance on the podcast, and talks about how he got into standup, why chicks love nice cars, and has a hilarious rap battle with Adam. It's one of our favorite eps ever.

episodes.title: ALN  - Special Announcement!
episodes.summary: Brad announces that next Monday's episode will be broadcast LIVE! on Monday at 6 p.m. PST on cogo.tv/aboutlastnight. You can watch the podcast live, interact with Adam and Brad, and have access to special rewards!

episodes.title: ALN - Brad and Adam 4/21/14
episodes.summary: No guest this week as Brad & Adam spend a hilarious hour talking about shitty high school jobs, making up commercials for Lunchables, and Brad's nephew discovering farts for the first time. We laughed a lot, and so will you. Follow us on Twitter @adamraycomedy and @funnybrad.

episodes.title: ALN - Brent Morin
episodes.summary: The hilarious Brent Morin stops by to talk about making a roller-skating movie, his new NBC show "Undateable," and serenades us with 90's pop ballads. It was an episode we didn't want to end. Follow him on Twitter @brentmorin.

episodes.title: ALN - Ron Funches
episodes.summary: Ron Funches is the most lovable man in comedy. He's one of the sweetest, funniest, most clever people you'll meet, so it's no wonder he's slowly taking over Hollywood. With appearances on Chelsea Lately, Conan, @Midnight, and a new series on NBC coming out in May called "Undateable," he will soon be unapproachable. That's not true. That's impossible, as you'll find out in this hilarious episode, with a hilarious human being. Follow Ron on twitter @ronfunches.

episodes.title: ALN - Neal Brennan
episodes.summary: He co-created the Chappelle Show, wrote Half Baked, wrote jokes for Seth Meyers to roast Obama, and has stories about Eddie Murphy that will make your jaw drop. Neal Brennan is a great dude, a prolific comedian, and a helluva a writer. It's one of our best episodes yet. Follow him on Twitter @nealbrennan.

episodes.title: ALN - Bob Saget
episodes.summary: The incredible Bob Saget stops by to talk about Full House, writing jokes for America's Funniest Home Videos, getting roasted by his friends & tells a Dave Coulier story you won't hear again. Get his new book "Dirty Daddy," and follow him on Twitter @bobsaget.

episodes.title: ALN - Russell Peters
episodes.summary: Russell Peters has sold out Toronto's Air Canada Center, drew the largest crowd ever for a standup show in Australia, and now he's stopping by the ALN podcast to talk about how YouTube gave him a career boost, the difference between performing in Sri-Lanka vs. Des Monies, and meeting Jon Bon Jovi. If you're a comedy junkie, this episode is for you. Follow Russell on twitter @therealrussellp.

episodes.title: ALN - Josh Adam Meyers
episodes.summary: With one of the best voices in the business, comedian Josh Adam Meyers stops by to tell us about his strip club DJ days, growing up the only white guy in Baltimore, and maybe the only story regarding 9/11 that will make you laugh. Follow him on Twitter @JoshAdamMeyers.

episodes.title: ALN - Kevin Nealon
episodes.summary: The one & only Kevin Nealon stops by to give us a rare glimpse into how his career came to be, getting SNL through Dana Carvey & the one sketch with Chris Farley that made him break character. Don't miss this one! And follow him on Twitter @kevin_nealon.

episodes.title: ALN - Taylor Williamson
episodes.summary: He was sleeping in his car two months before he won 2nd place on this past season of America's Got Talent, and now he's selling out all over the country. The adorable and hilarious Taylor Williamson stops by to talk about his teenage fans, his feud with Hedi Klum & meeting James Lipton. Follow him on twitter @taylorcomedy.

episodes.title: ALN - Jonathan Kite #2
episodes.summary: TWO BROKE GIRLS star Jonathan Kite returns to talk about his love for the NBA, does some amazing impressions, and prank calls a Thai restaurant as Jeff Bridges. If you want a lot of laughs, this episode is for you. Follow him on Twitter @jbkite.

episodes.title: ALN - Anders Holm
episodes.summary: WORKAHOLICS star Anders "DERS" Holm, stops by to talk about going to college in Wisconsin, getting his start in LA, and how having a baby has changed his life. It's a great interview from top to bottom. Follow him on twitter @ders808

episodes.title: ALN - Brad and Adam 1/27/14
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam are going to the SUPER BOWL! Today they talk about their upcoming sports journey, how Brad almost died in Vegas from a pot cookie, and introduce the About Last Night drinking game!

episodes.title: ALN - Mike Young
episodes.summary: Hilarious comic Mike Young stops by to talk about meeting John Stamos, playing basketball with Leo Dicaprio & making his new movie "My Man is a Loser."

episodes.title: ALN - Brittany Furlan
episodes.summary: She has the most followers on VINE in the history of the world, as well as the most natural energy, and she's fucking hilarious. Comedian Brittany Furlan joins us for an episode of this podcast you won't soon forget.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris D'Elia #2
episodes.summary: The one and only Chris D'Elia takes a break from being a TV star and friend of Justin Bieber, to talk about his new hour comedy special, why he thinks sports are ridiculous, and helps Adam come up with a new catchphrase. It's an incredible episode. Go see Chris live & find his tour dates at chrisdelia.com, and follow him on twitter @chrisdelia.

episodes.title: ALN - Jay Larson
episodes.summary:
Comedian Jay Larson stops by to talk 90's R&B, his amazing proposal story, and Adam talks about getting drunk with the Goo Goo Dolls.

Be sure to check out Jay's amazing podcast "The Crabfeast," on ITUNES & Stitcher. Follow him on twitter @jaylarsoncomedy

episodes.title: ALN - Lisa Kudrow
episodes.summary: She starred on FRIENDS, THE COMEBACK, WEB THERAPY, and now Lisa Kudrow is on the ABOUT LAST NIGHT podcast! This was an incredible episode. She tells the boys how getting fired from FRASIER helped her get FRIENDS, going from studying Science to Comedy, and working with Meryl Streep. Subscribe & rate the podcast on ITUNES!

episodes.title: ALN - Jaleel White #3
episodes.summary: Friend of the show, Jaleel White, stops by for his 3rd time to talk about the holidays, a midget clothing line for Brad, and helps us make up the first ever FAMILY MATTERS drinking game!

episodes.title: ALN - Skyler Stone
episodes.summary: Comedian Skyler Stone stops by to talk about pranking Twilight fans, his new movie "Walking With Dinosaurs", and does a few of his incredible impressions.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam 11/18/13
episodes.summary: The boys are back solo this week, and discuss a new project with Urkel, Brad's role in Adam's wedding, and play an all new round of "What Will Adam Believe."

episodes.title: ALN - Dr. Drew
episodes.summary: Dr. Drew takes a break from hosting LOVELINE & HLN'S "ON CALL," to talk about how he got into medicine, the dangers of prescription pill addiction, his passionate stance on gun control, and being on DAWSON'S CREEK.

episodes.title: ALN - Steve Simeone
episodes.summary: One of the best comedians in the biz, Steve Simeone, stops by to chat about his days working at The Comedy Store, how sex-education videos made him laugh as a kid, and attending the first ever taping of Double Dare.

episodes.title: ALN - Blake Anderson
episodes.summary: WORKAHOLICS creator & star Blake Anderson stops by to tell us how the story of how the show got made, making homemade backyard wrestling videos, crazy fan stories, and how Nickelodeon influenced his life.

episodes.title: ALN - Kirk Fox
episodes.summary: One of the best comics in the game and host of "The Test," on CBS, KIRK FOX, stops by the podcast and tells us about playing tennis with Dr. Phil, his amazing father, and is interrupted by the boys new sponsor; Danny Glover.

episodes.title: ALN - Jessimae Peluso
episodes.summary: GIRL CODE star Jessimae Peluso stops by to talk horrible pick up lines, meeting Lionel Ritchie, and her most paranoid weed story. It's a great episode from top to bottom. You'll fall in love like we did.

episodes.title: ALN - Owen Benjamin
episodes.summary: Owen Benjamin stops by to break down the differences between men & women, his love for The Neverending Story, & how Jimmy Fallon started his career.

episodes.title: ALN - Ben Gigli
episodes.summary: One of Adam's best buds from Seattle, Ben Gigli, stops by to talk about creating the web sensation "5 Second Films," driving stoned to Arizona, and his hilarious elementary school days with Adam.

episodes.title: ALN - Steve-O
episodes.summary: JACKASS star Steve-O stops by to talk about being lit on fire, his new Youtube Channel, and the transition from stunt man to standup.

episodes.title: ALN - Harland Williams #2
episodes.summary: The hilarious Harland Williams returns to talk about his new movie review podcast, the woman who pushed her husband off a cliff, and the boys teach him what a "queef" is.

episodes.title: ALN - Joey McIntyre
episodes.summary: Joey McIntyre from NEW KIDS ON THE BLOCK & "The Heat" stops by to talk crazy fan stories, Miley Cyrus, & sings a Boys II Men duet with Adam.

episodes.title: ALN - Taran Killiam
episodes.summary: SNL star Taran Killam stops by to talk being cast on MADTV at 19, the weekly grind of SNL, and makes fun of Adam's jar candles.

episodes.title: ALN - Brandon Brash
episodes.summary: General Hospital soap star Brandon Barash stops by with a bag of whiskey and Brad gets hammered.

episodes.title: ALN - Ryan Sickler
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam welcome Crabfeaster Ryan Sickler to the podcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Budd Friedman
episodes.summary: Budd Friedman is a legend. He is responsible for starting The Improv Comedy Clubs, and igniting the careers of Jay Leno, Ellen Degeneres, Adam Sandler, Larry David, Dave Chappelle, and Robin Williams. And he tells us all about it.

episodes.title: ALN - Dane Cook
episodes.summary: Dane Cook stops by to talk about going from comedy clubs to selling out Madison Square Garden, getting the call for SNL, the roughest year of his life, how ET inspired him, and creates a fake Harrison Ford movie with the guys.

episodes.title: ALN - Whitney Cummings
episodes.summary: Whitney Cummings stops by to talk about her new standup tour, creating a hit TV show, how she prepares for her shows, identifying with cartoons, and what's on her "fuck mix." It's an incredible interview.

episodes.title: ALN - Erik Griffin
episodes.summary: WORKAHOLICS star Erik Griffin stops by to talk about getting dumped before a show, dealing with fame, andaccusing the youth basketball team he coached of point shaving.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris Porter
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam welcome comedian Chris Porter. They discuss working at McDonalds, the plot of Air Bud 6, and Adam sleeping in Chris's bathroom.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam talk girls, being on stage and irrational fears of pugs.

episodes.title: ALN - Bobby Slayton
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam welcome "The Pitbull of Comedy"  Bobby Slayton.

episodes.title: ALN - Brad & Adam
episodes.summary: This week Brad and Adam are having a heart to heart about their relationship now that gay marriage is legal in California...pondering their marital status and wondering who would be the one wearing white.

episodes.title: ALN - Bobby Lee
episodes.summary: Bobby Lee visits the boys to talk about bagging dwarf babes in Thailand, Grimace penises and Bobby's part in Brad's career.

episodes.title: ALN - Paul Feig
episodes.summary: Paul Feig, director of BRIDESMAIDS, and the new movie THE HEAT, stops by to talk about directing The Office, Melissa McCarthy, starting standup, and Brad and Adam pitch him a dwarf musical...

episodes.title: ALN - Iliza Shlesinger
episodes.summary: Brad "Sexy Mustache" and Adam Ray invite Iliza Shlesinger to air her grievances with the Coffee Bean

episodes.title: ALN - Andrew Santino
episodes.summary: The guys invite friend Andrew Santino to discuss how to recognize a friends "poop run" and what to do if you get Punk'd.

episodes.title: ALN - Dan Levy
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam invite comic Dan Levy to talk about stomach acid, the death of your career and slutty mothers in Playboy.

episodes.title: ALN - Michael Yo
episodes.summary: The guys invite multi talented stand up Michael Yo to talk about Jewish Deli's in Houston and waxing your ass.

episodes.title: ALN - 5/6/13
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam discuss why they have been gone, Brad encountering a fan who is scared of midgets, and Adam interviews his nieces about Justin Bieber.

episodes.title: ALN - The Cabo Episode
episodes.summary: Brad & Ray podcasting from Cabo San Lucas. They explore the IKEA meatball, vacation Dwarf sex and the misuse of "Whatever happens in Vegas stays in Vegas".

episodes.title: ALN - Mark Serritella #2
episodes.summary: Our first episode on Fake Mustache Studios!  Brad and Adam discuss dwarf feet and why Jews should have more friends who are little people with guest Mark Serritella.

episodes.title: ALN - Mark Ellis
episodes.summary: Mark Ellis of the Schmoes Know podcast joins Brad and Adam in a bonus episode where they discuss Alf, John Stamos's fear of dwarfs, and using Goofy as a racial slur.

episodes.title: ALN - 4/8/13
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam talk about what happened at KROQ's April Foolishness Comedy show and compare stories about school bullies.

episodes.title: ALN - Ari Shaffir
episodes.summary: Ari Shaffir joins the guys to talk about his new special and tries to get Brad to do Mushrooms

episodes.title: ALN - 3/25/13
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam talk about why they can\'t go into Abercrombie & Fitch stores, create a Mexican talk show, and call comedian Skyler Stone in the hospital.

episodes.title: ALN - Adam Devine
episodes.summary: Workaholics star Adam Devine joins the guys to talk about creating the show, his beef with Joey Fatone, and improvises his version of Vanessa Carlton's "Thousand Miles."

episodes.title: ALN - Geoff Keith
episodes.summary: Comedian Geoff Keith talks about writing a book about creepy guys, bad college gigs, and getting high with Brad.

episodes.title: ALN - Chris D'Elia
episodes.summary: Chris D'Elia from Whitney joins Brad and Adam for some freestyle rapping and sets the record for the most 80's baseball references made in a podcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Joey Medina
episodes.summary: Brad talks about being a suspected terrorist, Adam describes the worst gig of his life, and Joey Medina pops by for some quick laughs.

episodes.title: ALN - Robert Fick & Dmitri Young
episodes.summary: Brad describes getting in a bar fight with his dwarf friend and former Major League Baseball players Robert Fick and Dmitri Young talk about the upcoming MLB season and their new podcast.

episodes.title: ALN - Darryl Wright
episodes.summary: Comedian Daryl Wright joins the guys to talk about shooting a crackhead, Super Bowl, and prison.

episodes.title: ALN - Harland Williams
episodes.summary: The great Harland Williams joins Brad and Adam. Harland shares some behind the scenes stories from filming Dumb and Dumber and his revolutionary new comedy special Harland Williams: A Force of Nature!

episodes.title: ALN - Jonathan Kite
episodes.summary: Two Broke Girls star and impressionist Jonathan Kite (Oleg) joins the guys to talk Tom Hanks and why Dr. Claw needs a reality show.

episodes.summary: Comedian Jay Davis shares stories of being Johnny Knoxville's roommate, touring with Dane Cook, and producing the biggest comedy shows in Hollywood

episodes.title: ALN - Jaleel White Returns
episodes.summary: Jaleel White returns! Tells stories about Eddie Winslow taking him on his first date and Adam surprises him with a rendition of the Family Matters theme song. Watch his show Total Blackout on SyFy channel!

episodes.title: ALN - Melissa Villasenor
episodes.summary: Melissa Villasenor stops by to share some of her incredible impressions and talk about her night at a club with Brad and Adam

episodes.title: ALN - 12/10/12

episodes.title: ALN - 12/3/12
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam discuss This Week In 12 Year Old Girl News and declare war on Randy Newman

episodes.title: ALN - Bret Ernst
episodes.summary: Bret Ernst joins Adam and Brad to talk road stories, lame music, and Bret compliments Brad's "root."

episodes.title: ALN - 11/19/12
episodes.summary: Brad and Adam discuss how to create a racial slur and play a round of What Will Adam Believe.

episodes.title: ALN - Dean Delray
episodes.summary: Brad & Adam welcome former rock star Dean DelRay to talk about starting comedy at 43, opening for The Wallflowers, and Adam's purple pants.

episodes.title: ALN - KT Tatara
episodes.summary: Comedian KT Tatara joins Brad and Adam to talk about love and Wendy's fast food.

episodes.title: ALN - Jaleel White
episodes.summary: Jaleel White aka Steve Urkel join Brad and Adam to talk Family Matters, NBA, and his new show Total Blackout on Syfy Channel.

episodes.title: ALN - Steve Rannazzisi
